original: de med kyang zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'i tshig med kyang ngo //
analyzed: de med kyang zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'i tshig med kyang ngo //
translated: “Even though it does not exist” means even though the thesis statement does not exist.

original: ci ste zhes bya ba ni phyir rgol bas 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs nges par bya ba'i don du dam bca' ba'i tshig nye bar 'god do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ci ste zhes bya ba ni phyir rgol bas 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs nges par bya ba'i don du dam bca' ba'i tshig nye bar 'god do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “If” means that the opponent sets forth the thesis statement in order to ascertain the contradictory reason.

original: phyir rgol ba gzhan dag gis so //
analyzed: phyir rgol ba gzhan dag gis so //
translated: “Other opponents” means other opponents.

original: 'dir brgal shing brtag pa 'di su la yin te /
analyzed: 'dir brgal shing brtag pa 'di su la yin te /
translated: “To whom is this objection applicable here?”

original: rgol ba'am / bstan bcos byed pa la yin /
analyzed: rgol ba'am / bstan bcos byed pa la yin /
translated: Is it applicable to the proponent or to the author of the treatise?

original: re zhig rgol ba la ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du rgol ba la'o zhe na zhes dogs pa byas so //
analyzed: re zhig rgol ba la ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du rgol ba la'o zhe na zhes dogs pa byas so //
translated: First, it is not applicable to the proponent. In order to demonstrate this, he says, “If you say to the proponent . . .”

original: bstan bcos byed pa'i nyes pa yang ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa'i nyes pa yang ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: He says, “Nor is it the fault of the author of the treatise,”

original: bstan bcos byed pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The author of the treatise” means the author of the treatise.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos byed pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos byed pa'o //
translated: “That” refers to the author of the treatise.

original: gzhan la ni rgol ba la'o //
analyzed: gzhan la ni rgol ba la'o //
translated: “To others” means to the opponent.

original: de'i phyir gal te dam bca' ba'i tshig med par bsgrub par bya ba'i rtogs pa skye ba yin na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te dam bca' ba'i tshig med par bsgrub par bya ba'i rtogs pa skye ba yin na /
translated: Therefore, if the understanding of the probandum arises even without the thesis statement,

original: de nye bar blangs pas 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs nges par byas pas ci zhig bya //
analyzed: de nye bar blangs pas 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs nges par byas pas ci zhig bya //
translated: What is the use of ascertaining a contradictory reason by taking it up?

original: khyab pa phyin ci log pa nyid las zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyab par kho na las 'gal ba nyid du rtogs par 'gyur dam bca' ba'i tshig las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: khyab pa phyin ci log pa nyid las zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyab par kho na las 'gal ba nyid du rtogs par 'gyur dam bca' ba'i tshig las ni ma yin no //
translated: “From the pervasion being reversed” means that contradiction is understood only from the pervasion by impermanence, not from the words of the thesis.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa gnyi ga ltar yang dam bca' ba'i tshig ni don med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa gnyi ga ltar yang dam bca' ba'i tshig ni don med pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, in both cases, the words of the thesis are meaningless.

original: @36a * // de nyid la nyes pa gzhan yang brjod pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: @36a * // de nyid la nyes pa gzhan yang brjod pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Another fault in that is stated:

original: gal te dam bca' ba'i tshig 'gal ba nges pa'i don du yin na /
analyzed: gal te dam bca' ba'i tshig 'gal ba nges pa'i don du yin na /
translated: Moreover, if the meaning of the words of the thesis is contradictory,

original: de'i tshe sgra rtag ste zhes dam bca' ba ni tshig rab tu sbyar ba'i rtag pa nyid la sogs pa gang yin pa de la ltos nas 'gal ba brjod ba'am zhes bya'o ;
analyzed: de'i tshe sgra rtag ste zhes dam bca' ba ni tshig rab tu sbyar ba'i rtag pa nyid la sogs pa gang yin pa de la ltos nas 'gal ba brjod ba'am zhes bya'o ;
translated: then at that time, the thesis “Sound is permanent” is contradictory in relation to whatever permanence, etc., is expressed by the words.

original: / gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: / gang gi tshe zhe na /
translated: When?

original: sgra rtag ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra rtag ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Sound is permanent.”

original: gal te de ltar 'gal pa brjod pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar 'gal pa brjod pa yin na /
translated: If it is the case that the contradiction is stated,

original: de'i tshe sgra rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i skabs kho nar yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i tshe sgra rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i skabs kho nar yin gyi /
translated: then it is only in the context of the statement, “Sound is permanent because it is produced,”

original: sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i skabs su ni 'gal ba brjod ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i skabs su ni 'gal ba brjod ba ma yin no //
translated: that there is a contradiction, but not in the context of the statement, “Sound is impermanent because it is produced.”

original: des na 'dir dam bca'i tshig dgos pa med pa'i phyir na bya ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na 'dir dam bca'i tshig dgos pa med pa'i phyir na bya ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, in this case, because the words of the thesis are not necessary, it would be said that they are not used.

original: de ni bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i don du nye bar bkod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i don du nye bar bkod pa yin gyi /
translated: It is set forth for the purpose of understanding the probandum,

original: 'gal ba nges pa'i don du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba nges pa'i don du ni ma yin no //
translated: but not for the purpose of ascertaining a contradiction.

original: bsgrub bya rtogs pa yang dam bca' ba med pa kho nar grub ste /
analyzed: bsgrub bya rtogs pa yang dam bca' ba med pa kho nar grub ste /
translated: The understanding of the probandum is established even without a thesis.

original: des na dam bca' ba'i tshig gis ni ci yang byar med do //
analyzed: des na dam bca' ba'i tshig gis ni ci yang byar med do //
translated: Therefore, the words of the thesis are useless.

original: kha cig ni 'di ltar mi 'chad de dam bca' ba'i tshig sbyor ba rkang mig pa la sogs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: kha cig ni 'di ltar mi 'chad de dam bca' ba'i tshig sbyor ba rkang mig pa la sogs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Some do not explain it in this way.

original: de la ltos nas ni dam bca' ba la ltos nas de'i lugs la 'gal bar brjod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de la ltos nas ni dam bca' ba la ltos nas de'i lugs la 'gal bar brjod pa yin gyi /
translated: In relation to that, in relation to the thesis means that the contradiction is stated in that system,

original: sangs rgyas ba'i lugs la ni ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ba'i lugs la ni ma yin pa ste /
translated: but not in the Buddhist system.

original: khyab pa bstan par bya ba kho nas 'gal bas rtogs pas rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyab pa bstan par bya ba kho nas 'gal bas rtogs pas rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because the pervasion is shown, the contradiction is understood by the understanding of the thesis, it is said.

original: de dang zhes bya bsgrub par byed pa dang ma 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: de dang zhes bya bsgrub par byed pa dang ma 'brel ba'o //
translated: The word that is not related to the proof.

original: de zhes bya ba sgrub par byed pa dang ma 'brel pa ma tshang bas so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba sgrub par byed pa dang ma 'brel pa ma tshang bas so //
translated: The word that is incomplete because it is not related to the proof.

original: ma tshang ba med pa nyid ces bya ba yongs su rtogs pa nyid med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma tshang ba med pa nyid ces bya ba yongs su rtogs pa nyid med par 'gyur te /
translated: The word incompleteness means that there would be no complete understanding.

original: gang zhig nye bar mi mkho bas nye ba ma yin pa de nyid kyis ma tshang bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang zhig nye bar mi mkho bas nye ba ma yin pa de nyid kyis ma tshang bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is not needed is not complete, it follows that there is incompleteness.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni nye bar mi mkho ba yin na'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni nye bar mi mkho ba yin na'o //
translated: If it were not so, means if it were not needed.

original: dam bca' ba'i tshig med pa la yang ma tshang ba ma yin pa nyid mtshungs so //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i tshig med pa la yang ma tshang ba ma yin pa nyid mtshungs so //
translated: Even without the words of the thesis, incompleteness is the same.

original: de'i phyir dam bca' ba la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba zhig ma tshang na ma tshang ba yin no zhes brtsad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dam bca' ba la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba zhig ma tshang na ma tshang ba yin no zhes brtsad par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should not be argued that if any one of the thesis, etc. is incomplete, then the proof is incomplete.

original: ha cang byang ches pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ha cang byang ches pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The definition of the thesis is too broad.

original: gang zhig gang gis bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa de thams cad dam bca' ba yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gis bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa de thams cad dam bca' ba yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because whatever is indicated by the reason is the thesis,

original: dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid ha cang khyab ches bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid ha cang khyab ches bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the definition of the thesis is too broad.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bsgrub par bya ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The object to be established is called the thesis.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas pa'o //
translated: Whatever is indicated by the reason is the thesis.

original: bsgrub bya @36b brjod pa dam bca' na'ang zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya @36b brjod pa dam bca' na'ang zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: If the statement of the object to be established is the thesis, then the statement of the object to be established is not the proof of the thesis.🔽Not only is there no fault of incompleteness,

original: ma tshang ba'i nyes pa med pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: ma tshang ba'i nyes pa med pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: but also

original: bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid yin par smra yang sangs rgyas ba de la ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs brjod pa yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i skyon 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid yin par smra yang sangs rgyas ba de la ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs brjod pa yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i skyon 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: Even though it is said that the definition of a thesis is “that which is to be established,” the statement of a reason that is not established with regard to that buddha would be a thesis.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: sgrub byed ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub byed ces bya ba'o //
translated: It is called “the proof.”

original: der zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba mig gis gzung ba nyid dam bca' bar thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba mig gis gzung ba nyid dam bca' bar thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: “There” means that it is not the case that the apparent reason “is apprehended by the eye” is a consequence that is a thesis.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The apparent reason” makes this clear.

original: 'di la brjod pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “This is said” means

original: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di la rnam par rtog pa gnyis te /🔽ci bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan pa'am /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di la rnam par rtog pa gnyis te / ci bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan pa'am /
translated: that there are two interpretations of the statement “the teaching of the probandum.”🔽Is it the teaching of the probandum itself,

original: 'on te bsgrub par bya ba'i bstan pa zhes bya ba'o //🔽de la phyogs dang po la brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'on te bsgrub par bya ba'i bstan pa zhes bya ba'o // de la phyogs dang po la brjod pa ni /
translated: or is it the teaching of the proof of the probandum?

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: With regard to the first possibility, the statement is this.🔽If it is the teaching of the probandum itself,

original: sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba bstan pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba bstan pa'o //
translated: “It appears to be a proof” is the explanation of the appearance of a proof.

original: 'o na phyogs 'di la dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid skyon med par gyur to zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na phyogs 'di la dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid skyon med par gyur to zhe na /
translated: “But in this case, the definition of a thesis is not faulty.”

original: 'on kyang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes gsungs so //
translated: “But” is stated.

original: bstan par bya ba zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid kyis rtogs par bya ba mtshan nyid kyi tshig gis ma bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid kyis rtogs par bya ba mtshan nyid kyi tshig gis ma bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: “What is to be demonstrated” is what is to be understood through a definition. It would not be demonstrated by the words of the definition.

original: bstan par bya ba ma bstan na yang nyes pa brjod pa ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba ma bstan na yang nyes pa brjod pa ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If what is to be demonstrated is not demonstrated, the statement of the fault is ‘the probandum is demonstrated.’”

original: gang zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'am sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'am sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: “What” is the probandum or the proof.

original: phyogs gnyis pa la brjod pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa la brjod pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement about the second position is “But.”

original: de'i tshe yang ci ltar bstan zhes mi shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang ci ltar bstan zhes mi shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: “At that time, how is it demonstrated?” would not be understood.

original: 'brel to ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: 'brel to ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: “What is the connection?” Why?

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du zhe'am bsgrub par bya ba nyid du zhes bya ba'i skabs ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du zhe'am bsgrub par bya ba nyid du zhes bya ba'i skabs ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not stated whether it is the proof or the probandum.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra ba gzhan la 'dri ba ni ci ltar na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra ba gzhan la 'dri ba ni ci ltar na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The question to another philosopher is “How?”

original: gzhan gyi lan ni lnga pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi lan ni lnga pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The opponent’s answer is “The fifth.”

original: yang na rnam par dbye ba dang po las gzhan dang po ma gtogs pas bstan pa ste /
analyzed: yang na rnam par dbye ba dang po las gzhan dang po ma gtogs pas bstan pa ste /
translated: Or, the first is taught as other than the first, excluding the first.

original: du ba yod pas du ba yod pa ni zhes bya bas ni bstan pa de ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: du ba yod pas du ba yod pa ni zhes bya bas ni bstan pa de ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
translated: “ Because smoke exists, smoke exists” teaches that this is taught as the proof.

original: gang zhig sgra ni mi rtag go zhes dang po bstan par bya ba de ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid du yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig sgra ni mi rtag go zhes dang po bstan par bya ba de ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid du yin no zhe na /
translated: “ That which is first taught, ‘Sound is impermanent,’ is the probandum.”

original: grub pa'i mtha' pa gzhan la 'dri ba ni 'di ga las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' pa gzhan la 'dri ba ni 'di ga las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The question to another philosopher is “Why?”

original: pha rol po gtan tshigs smra ba ni de @37a * //
analyzed: pha rol po gtan tshigs smra ba ni de @37a * //
translated: The opponent who states the reason is “He says . . .”

original: ltar sgra'i don zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ltar sgra'i don zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ In that way, the meaning of the word . . .”

original: lan ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is “If it were.”

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Because it is the thesis.”

original: 'on phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But then the definition of the position would not be stated.

original: phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is “The position.”

original: gnyi ga ltar yang nges par gzung ba'i nyes pa nye bar sdud pa ni /
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang nges par gzung ba'i nyes pa nye bar sdud pa ni /
translated: The fault of the double entendre is summarized:

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, the statement “The thesis is the statement of the proposition” is not correct.

original: don med pas zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten na grub zin pa'i phyir ro //🔽'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa nyid dam bca' ba yin no zhes bya ba 'dir bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni nges pa med la dam bca' pa ni nges par 'jig rten na grags pa yin no //
analyzed: don med pas zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten na grub zin pa'i phyir ro // 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa nyid dam bca' ba yin no zhes bya ba 'dir bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni nges pa med la dam bca' pa ni nges par 'jig rten na grags pa yin no //
translated: The statement “The thesis is the statement of the proposition” is not correct because it is meaningless, since it is already established in everyday life.🔽The statement “The thesis is the statement of the proposition” is not correct because the statement of the proposition is not necessarily a thesis, but a thesis is necessarily a statement of the proposition.

original: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bca' ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid la ni bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa dam bca' ba la nges pa yin la /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bca' ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid la ni bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa dam bca' ba la nges pa yin la /
translated: The statement “The thesis is the statement of the proposition” is not correct because the statement of the proposition is not necessarily a thesis, but a thesis is necessarily a statement of the proposition.

original: dam bca' ba ni bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa la ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' ba ni bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa la ma nges pa yin no //
translated: A thesis is an uncertain statement of what is to be established.

original: des na sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, even a pseudo-proof would be a thesis.

original: khyed kyis zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa sangs rgyas pa'i phyogs la'o //
analyzed: khyed kyis zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa sangs rgyas pa'i phyogs la'o //
translated: The word you refers to the opponent, the Buddhist.

original: lan ni sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word proof is the reply.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba'o //
translated: The word if introduces a doubt.

original: sgrub par byed par gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa yang brgya la dam bca' bar 'gyur ro zhes de ltar the tshom zab ldog pa'i rgyu ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed par gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa yang brgya la dam bca' bar 'gyur ro zhes de ltar the tshom zab ldog pa'i rgyu ci yin zhe na /
translated: If a statement of what is to be established by a proof were a thesis, then why would a doubt arise?

original: lan ni rigs mi mthun pa nyid the tshom ldog pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni rigs mi mthun pa nyid the tshom ldog pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply is that the cause of the cessation of doubt is the very fact that the two are of different types.

original: 'di ltar sgrub par byed pas bstan pa dang bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni sgrub par byed pa yin pa dang ma yin pa nyid kyis rigs mi mthun pa kho na ste des na dogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar sgrub par byed pas bstan pa dang bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni sgrub par byed pa yin pa dang ma yin pa nyid kyis rigs mi mthun pa kho na ste des na dogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, a statement of what is to be established by a proof and a statement of what is to be established are of different types, in that the former is a proof and the latter is not. Therefore, there is no reason to doubt.

original: 'di nyid ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o//
analyzed: 'di nyid ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o//
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: rigs gcig ces bya ba ni rigs mi mthun pa la ni the tshom 'jug pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rigs gcig ces bya ba ni rigs mi mthun pa la ni the tshom 'jug pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Of the same type” means that doubt does not arise with regard to a dissimilar type.

original: pha rol po ha cang khyab pa yod pa ni shes par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pha rol po ha cang khyab pa yod pa ni shes par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The opponent’s position is that the existence of the pervasion is what is to be proven.

original: bum pa ni skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'i dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: bum pa ni skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'i dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
translated: The pot is what is to be proven from the perspective of the cause that produces it.

original: des na de ston par ni dam bca' ba ma yin no zhes grub pa'i mtha' pa nga'i lan yang 'di kho na yin no zhes ston pa ni /
analyzed: des na de ston par ni dam bca' ba ma yin no zhes grub pa'i mtha' pa nga'i lan yang 'di kho na yin no zhes ston pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the thesis is not what is to be taught. This is the only response of the Mīmāṃsaka.

original: gal te de ltar zhes bya ba'o //🔽rtsod pa'i tshe 'chad pa ni gal te gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te de ltar zhes bya ba'o // rtsod pa'i tshe 'chad pa ni gal te gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If that is so” teaches this.🔽“If it is said that . . .” explains the debate.

original: sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: “If it is said that . . . it is not a proof” teaches the opponent’s position.

original: sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i @37b phyir ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i @37b phyir ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Because it is not a proof” teaches the response.

original: sgrub pa'i mtha'i cha rnam par 'grel pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i mtha'i cha rnam par 'grel pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The commentary on the conclusion of the proof is “If . . . ”

original: 'on te zhes bya ba nas zhe na'i bar ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba nas zhe na'i bar ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: “But . . . ” is the objection.

original: lan ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //🔽dam bca' ba ni zhes bya ba ni dogs pa ste /
analyzed: lan ni gal te zhes bya ba'o // dam bca' ba ni zhes bya ba ni dogs pa ste /
translated: The response is “If . . . ”

original: mig gis gzung ba nyid ni dam bca' gcig yin te /
analyzed: mig gis gzung ba nyid ni dam bca' gcig yin te /
translated: The thesis is “is apprehended by the eye” . . .

original: sgra mi rtog go zhes bya ba'i dam bca' ba gnyis pa 'di'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra mi rtog go zhes bya ba'i dam bca' ba gnyis pa 'di'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The second thesis, “sound is not conceptual,” would not be established.

original: des na zhes bya ba sgrub par byed pa ma yin pas na ma grub pa'i mtshan nyid ni skyon nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba sgrub par byed pa ma yin pas na ma grub pa'i mtshan nyid ni skyon nyid do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, since it is not a proof, the characteristic of nonestablishment is a fault.

original: lan ni sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is “Proof . . . ”

original: dam bca' ba nyid kyis na mig gis gzung ba nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: dam bca' ba nyid kyis na mig gis gzung ba nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na /
translated: If the thesis itself is the proof of “is apprehended by the eye,”

original: de'i tshe ci ltar sgrub par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: de'i tshe ci ltar sgrub par byed pa ma yin /
translated: then how could it not be a proof?

original: rang gi don ni rang gis brjod bya ste mig gis gzung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya ba mig gis gzung ba nyid ni mig gis gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i 'thad pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi don ni rang gis brjod bya ste mig gis gzung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya ba mig gis gzung ba nyid ni mig gis gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i 'thad pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the word “itself” is the object of expression. The word “because it is apprehended by the eye” is the reason. The word “because it is apprehended by the eye” is the proof.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: The word “not” is the reply.

original: tshig tsam ni 'ga' yang sgrub byed ma yin gyi /
analyzed: tshig tsam ni 'ga' yang sgrub byed ma yin gyi /
translated: Words alone are not proofs.

original: 'on kyang brjod par bya ba dang bcas pa'i tshig sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang brjod par bya ba dang bcas pa'i tshig sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: Rather, words that have objects of expression are proofs.

original: de ltar ma yin na ni dus ba zhes bya ba'i tshig tsam sgrub byed yin par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na ni dus ba zhes bya ba'i tshig tsam sgrub byed yin par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If that were not so, then the mere word “smoke” would be a proof.

original: du ba nyid ni ma yin no //🔽de bas na brjod par bya ba mig gis gzung bya nyid dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: du ba nyid ni ma yin no // de bas na brjod par bya ba mig gis gzung bya nyid dang bcas pa'o //
translated: But “smoke” itself is not.🔽Therefore, the object of expression is “because it is apprehended by the eye.”

original: mig gis gzung bya yin ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tshig sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mig gis gzung bya yin ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tshig sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: The word “because it is apprehended by the eye” is the proof.

original: gang gi mig gis gzung bya nyid sgrub byed yin par 'gyur ba chos can sgra la tshogs pa grub par yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi mig gis gzung bya nyid sgrub byed yin par 'gyur ba chos can sgra la tshogs pa grub par yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is the subject, sound, established as a collection, which would be the object to be grasped by that eye.

original: 'o na bdag nyid kyi sgrub byed yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na bdag nyid kyi sgrub byed yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that it is the probandum for itself,

original: de nyid ni zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid ni zhes gsungs te /
translated: [Nāgārjuna] says, “That very . . .”

original: tshig dang bcas pa mig gis gzung bya'i mtshan nyid kyi don to //
analyzed: tshig dang bcas pa mig gis gzung bya'i mtshan nyid kyi don to //
translated: The meaning is that it has the characteristic of being the object to be grasped by the eye together with the word.

original: rang gi tshig dang bcas pa'i mig gis gzung bya ni bdag nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi tshig dang bcas pa'i mig gis gzung bya ni bdag nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the object to be grasped by the eye together with its own word is not the probandum for itself.

original: sgra 'ba' zhig kyang sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa ni sgra'i phur ma zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra 'ba' zhig kyang sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa ni sgra'i phur ma zhes bya ba'o //
translated: [Nāgārjuna] says, “The mere word . . .” to indicate that mere sound is also not the probandum.

original: me bsgrub par bya ba la yang du ba yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tshig tsam ni sgrub byed ma yin gyi /
analyzed: me bsgrub par bya ba la yang du ba yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tshig tsam ni sgrub byed ma yin gyi /
translated: Also, with respect to establishing fire, the mere word “because smoke exists” is not the probandum,

original: 'on kyang phyi rol gyi don nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang phyi rol gyi don nyid yin te /
translated: but rather it is an external object.

original: sgra rnams phyi'i don dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra rnams phyi'i don dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because words are not related to external objects.

original: 'o na sgra gang gi sgrub par byed pa nyid yin snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na sgra gang gi sgrub par byed pa nyid yin snyam na /
translated: Now, if one thinks, “What is the proof of the word?”

original: bsam pa zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: bsam pa zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says, “intention.”

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni sgra bsam pa'i sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni sgra bsam pa'i sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: “ But” means that the word is not the proof of the intention,

original: 'on kyang me la sogs pa @38a * //
analyzed: 'on kyang me la sogs pa @38a * //
translated: but rather that the meaning of fire, etc.

original: don nyid kyi yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don nyid kyi yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is the proof.

original: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'i tshig nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'i tshig nyid kyis so //
translated: “ By that alone” means by the statement of the conclusion alone.

original: des na gtan tshigs kyi tshig don med do zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs kyi tshig don med do zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The thought is that the statement of the reason is meaningless.

original: de las bya ba ni dam bca' ba'i tshig las so //
analyzed: de las bya ba ni dam bca' ba'i tshig las so //
translated: “ From that” means from the statement of the conclusion.

original: gzhan dag brjod pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'i sgo'i t'i ka byed pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag brjod pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'i sgo'i t'i ka byed pa'o //
translated: “ Others say” is the statement of the opponent’s position.

original: 'o na ci ltar ma nges pa spong snyam na de ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar ma nges pa spong snyam na de ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Now, if one thinks, “How does he avoid the fault of inconclusiveness?” he says, “That is not so.”

original: ma nges pa de'o //🔽'di ni sngar bshad zin te zhes bya ba ni rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par ro //
analyzed: ma nges pa de'o // 'di ni sngar bshad zin te zhes bya ba ni rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par ro //
translated: “ That” refers to the inconclusiveness.🔽“ This has been explained earlier” in the case of inference for oneself.

original: de nyid brjod pa ni 'don ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid brjod pa ni 'don ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ That itself is stated” is the statement of the reason.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni rig byed kyi khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro 'di ni lan ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni rig byed kyi khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro 'di ni lan ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is because it is a special kind of inference. This is not an answer.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi 'gal ba'i bar yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs las zlog par byed pa nyid du khas len na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi 'gal ba'i bar yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs las zlog par byed pa nyid du khas len na /
translated: Otherwise, if one accepts that even that which is not contradictory with the counter-position reverses the counter-position,

original: de lta bu ma yin na zhes bya ba sus brjod par mi nus /
analyzed: de lta bu ma yin na zhes bya ba sus brjod par mi nus /
translated: then who could say that it is not like that?

original: 'di ltar sgra ni mi rtag ste gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar sgra ni mi rtag ste gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: Thus, when one says, “Sound is impermanent because it is an object of knowledge,”

original: gal te pha rol nam mkhas 'khrul par brjod na ;
analyzed: gal te pha rol nam mkhas 'khrul par brjod na ;
translated: if the opponent says that it is confused about space,

original: de'i tshe nam mkha' ma yin pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe nam mkha' ma yin pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: then one should say, “It is not space.”

original: yang phyogs la sogs pas 'khrul bar brjod na /
analyzed: yang phyogs la sogs pas 'khrul bar brjod na /
translated: If one says that it is confused about the position, etc.,

original: phyogs ma yin pa zhes so //
analyzed: phyogs ma yin pa zhes so //
translated: then one should say, “It is not the position.”

original: de lta yin dang gzhal bya nyid kyang sgrub byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin dang gzhal bya nyid kyang sgrub byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: If that is the case, then being an object of knowledge would also be the proof.

original: dam bca' bsgrub par byed pa med pa la yang nyes pa ci yod snyam na /
analyzed: dam bca' bsgrub par byed pa med pa la yang nyes pa ci yod snyam na /
translated: What is wrong with not proving the thesis?

original: dam bca' bar sgrub par byed pa yin pa la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dam bca' bar sgrub par byed pa yin pa la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “it is to be established” is the thesis.

original: de phyogs yin nam zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs las go bar byed pa nyid phyogs su brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: de phyogs yin nam zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs las go bar byed pa nyid phyogs su brjod pa yin la /
translated: The statement “is that so?” is the position that is understood from the reason.

original: go bar byed pa de yang grub pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: go bar byed pa de yang grub pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t that which is understood already established?

original: grub pa yin zhes bya ba'i dpyad pa 'dis ci bya /🔽ci ltar sgrub par bya ba nyid dam /
analyzed: grub pa yin zhes bya ba'i dpyad pa 'dis ci bya / ci ltar sgrub par bya ba nyid dam /
translated: What is the point of this analysis, “It is established”?

original: grub pa nyid du rtogs pa de ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grub pa nyid du rtogs pa de ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: It is just as you understand it to be, that is, as something to be established or as something that is established.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang cig shos zhes zlas dbye ste /🔽de dag la log par te bsgrub par bya ba la log par bsgrub bya ma yin pa dang / cig shos bsgrub bya ma yin pa la bzlog pa bsgrub bar bya ba nyid de /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang cig shos zhes zlas dbye ste / de dag la log par te bsgrub par bya ba la log par bsgrub bya ma yin pa dang / cig shos bsgrub bya ma yin pa la bzlog pa bsgrub bar bya ba nyid de /
translated: The words “the object to be established and the other” are in apposition.🔽The error in regard to them is as follows: the object to be established is not the object to be refuted, and the other, which is not the object to be established, is not the object to be refuted.

original: yul de la bsgrub par bya ba la bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa la ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes log par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: yul de la bsgrub par bya ba la bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa la ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes log par rtogs pa'o //
translated: The error is to think that the object to be established is not the object to be established, and that the object to be refuted is the object to be established.

original: log par rtogs pa nyid ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: log par rtogs pa nyid ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase “in this way” indicates the mistaken understanding.

original: gzhan gyi don tsam zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa gzhan gyi don byed pa tsam ni grangs can gyis bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don tsam zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa gzhan gyi don byed pa tsam ni grangs can gyis bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The phrase “mere otherness” means that the Sāṃkhya does not prove that the eyes and so on are mere otherness,

original: bdag gi don bsgrub par bya @38b yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽de lta na yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa spang ba'i don du grangs can gyis /
analyzed: bdag gi don bsgrub par bya @38b yin pa'i phyir ro // de lta na yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa spang ba'i don du grangs can gyis /
translated: because they are to be established as being for the sake of the self.

original: gzhan tsam zhig sgrub bar byed par smras pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan tsam zhig sgrub bar byed par smras pa yin no //
translated: Even so, in order to avoid the fault of non-pervasion, the Sāṃkhya says that he proves mere otherness.

original: bdag gi don gyi bsgrub par bya ba yin yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par smra ste /
analyzed: bdag gi don gyi bsgrub par bya ba yin yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par smra ste /
translated: Even though they are to be established as being for the sake of the self, he says that they are not to be established,

original: sangs rgyas pa la dpe ma grub pa'i phyir ro //🔽bstan bcos las grub pa yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa la dpe ma grub pa'i phyir ro // bstan bcos las grub pa yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: because the Buddhist example is not established.

original: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa bstan bcos las grub pa yang bsgrub par bya ba yin par smra ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa bstan bcos las grub pa yang bsgrub par bya ba yin par smra ba'o //
translated: The phrase “established in the treatise” means that the Sāṃkhya says that even the established in the treatise, such as the quality of space, is to be established.

original: khas ma blangs kyang zhes bya ba ni rgol bas khas ma blangs kyang ngo //
analyzed: khas ma blangs kyang zhes bya ba ni rgol bas khas ma blangs kyang ngo //
translated: Even though it is not accepted means even though the opponent does not accept it.

original: gang gi phyir de srid kyi log bar rtogs pa yod pa'i gtan tshigs de bas na log par rtogs pa de bsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de srid kyi log bar rtogs pa yod pa'i gtan tshigs de bas na log par rtogs pa de bsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of that, the reason for the existence of a misconception, therefore, in order to eliminate that misconception.

original: phyin ci log de zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyin ci log de zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That misconception means

original: ma grub pa la sogs pa de dag las bzlog pa grub pa la sogs pa bsal bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa la sogs pa de dag las bzlog pa grub pa la sogs pa bsal bar rig par bya'o //
translated: the opposite of those, nonestablishment, etc., should be understood as eliminated.

original: gang gis de bsal nas mtshan nyid brjod pa grub pa la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa nyid ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis de bsal nas mtshan nyid brjod pa grub pa la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa nyid ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Having eliminated that, why is the definition stated, establishment, etc., not to be established?

original: de la zhes gsungs te bsal ba la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes gsungs te bsal ba la'o //
translated: In that regard, he says, in the elimination.

original: rigs ston pa nyid ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rigs ston pa nyid ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of the reason is if, etc.

original: don 'di zhes bya ba ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: don 'di zhes bya ba ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'o //
translated: This meaning, etc., is God, etc.

original: gzhan phyir rgol ba la bstan bcos tshad ma ma yin pa des na tshad ma gzhan dag ni gzhan de'i don du yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan phyir rgol ba la bstan bcos tshad ma ma yin pa des na tshad ma gzhan dag ni gzhan de'i don du yin no zhe na /
translated: Since that treatise is not a valid means of knowledge for the opponent, the other valid means of knowledge are for the sake of that other purpose.

original: lan ni bdag nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni bdag nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is itself, etc.

original: khas blangs pa zhes bya ba ni dgos pa'o //
analyzed: khas blangs pa zhes bya ba ni dgos pa'o //
translated: The word promise is the purpose.

original: lan 'debs pa ni gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan 'debs pa ni gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is by the opponent.

original: gal te rgol bas khas blangs pas bstan bcos tshad ma yin na de'i tshe phyir rgol bas kyang bstan bcos khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te rgol bas khas blangs pas bstan bcos tshad ma yin na de'i tshe phyir rgol bas kyang bstan bcos khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: If the treatise is valid because of the opponent's promise, then the opponent should also accept the treatise.

original: de ltar rang gi sgra'i rnam par gcod pa brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar rang gi sgra'i rnam par gcod pa brjod nas /
translated: Having thus stated the exclusion of one's own words,

original: kho na'i sgra'i rnam par gcad pa brjod pa ni /
analyzed: kho na'i sgra'i rnam par gcad pa brjod pa ni /
translated: he states the exclusion of the word only.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word thus is that.

original: de ni mig gis gzung ba nyid do //
analyzed: de ni mig gis gzung ba nyid do //
translated: That is the object of the eye.

original: 'dod pa'i sgra'i rnam par gcad par bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i sgra'i rnam par gcad par bya ba la /
translated: In the exclusion of the word desire,

original: rigs pa brjod pa ni don brjod pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rigs pa brjod pa ni don brjod pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the statement of reasoning is the statement of meaning.

original: don gyi brjod pa phyir rgol ba la bsgrub par bya ba ma yin na phyir rgol ba dag gi don shes pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don gyi brjod pa phyir rgol ba la bsgrub par bya ba ma yin na phyir rgol ba dag gi don shes pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the statement of meaning is not to be established for the opponent, then the opponent's understanding of the meaning would not occur.

original: gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ni dngos su brjod pa'i gzhan gyi don tsam la yang grub pa la sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ni dngos su brjod pa'i gzhan gyi don tsam la yang grub pa la sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The word elsewhere means that even in the mere other-purpose directly stated, there would be establishment as the probandum.

original: don gyis brjod pa ci ltar nges she na skabs dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don gyis brjod pa ci ltar nges she na skabs dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How is the meaning expressed ascertained? “ In context” is the answer.

original: gal te phyir rgol ba skabs mngon par mi shes pa gang yin pa de la ltos nas don gyi brjod pa bsgrub @39a * //🔽par bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: gal te phyir rgol ba skabs mngon par mi shes pa gang yin pa de la ltos nas don gyi brjod pa bsgrub @39a * // par bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: If the opponent does not understand the context, then the expression of the meaning is not to be established.

original: skabs mi shes pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skabs mi shes pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ By one who does not understand the context” is the answer.

original: gal te skabs la sogs pa las don nges pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di khyed nyid kyi 'dod pa ma yin nam snyam na /
analyzed: gal te skabs la sogs pa las don nges pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di khyed nyid kyi 'dod pa ma yin nam snyam na /
translated: If it is thought that this, “The meaning is ascertained from the context, etc.,” is not the assertion of the opponent,

original: de skad du yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de skad du yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “It is said” is the answer.

original: skabs la sogs pa las don nges pa 'di ni thams cad 'dod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skabs la sogs pa las don nges pa 'di ni thams cad 'dod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that this ascertainment of the meaning from the context, etc., is the assertion of all.

original: skabs su gzhan bab la zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don nyid do //
analyzed: skabs su gzhan bab la zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don nyid do //
translated: “ In the context of another” is one’s own purpose.

original: bsgrub par bya ba gzhan yin na zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don tsam mo //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba gzhan yin na zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don tsam mo //
translated: “ If the other is to be established” is the mere purpose of another.

original: de la ni rgol ba la'o //
analyzed: de la ni rgol ba la'o //
translated: “ In that” is with regard to the opponent.

original: 'chad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'chad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ It is said” is the explanation.

original: rgol ba'i 'di de skabs su bab pa yin yang bdag ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no zhes bdag nyid smra na /
analyzed: rgol ba'i 'di de skabs su bab pa yin yang bdag ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no zhes bdag nyid smra na /
translated: Although this is the proper occasion for the opponent to argue, he says that he himself is not the object to be established.

original: de'i tshe rgol ba des bdag nyid la skabs su ma bab pa brjod pa'i sgo nas skyon brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe rgol ba des bdag nyid la skabs su ma bab pa brjod pa'i sgo nas skyon brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if he says, “I am not the probandum,” then at that time the opponent would be at fault, because he would be stating that the occasion is not appropriate for himself.

original: pha rol gyis smras pa /🔽rgol ba de la skyon yod mod /
analyzed: pha rol gyis smras pa / rgol ba de la skyon yod mod /
translated: The opponent says:🔽“Although that opponent has a fault, the Buddhist opponent also has a fault.”

original: phyir rgol ba sangs rgyas ba la yang skyon yod pa nyid do zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: phyir rgol ba sangs rgyas ba la yang skyon yod pa nyid do zhes 'brel to //
translated: This is the connection.

original: ci ltar zhen yang dag pa'i skyon mi brjod pas so //
analyzed: ci ltar zhen yang dag pa'i skyon mi brjod pas so //
translated: How so? Because he does not state the fault of the correct position.

original: lan ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply is “No.”

original: gal te don bstan pas zhes bya ba ni gal te 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba 'dis so //
analyzed: gal te don bstan pas zhes bya ba ni gal te 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba 'dis so //
translated: If it is said, “By teaching the meaning,” if it is said, “It is to be established in this way,”

original: 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bshad pa ni ci skad du bya ba ste rtsa ba'i slob dpon gyis so //
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bshad pa ni ci skad du bya ba ste rtsa ba'i slob dpon gyis so //
translated: in order to clarify this very point, it is explained, “What is to be said?” by the root master.

original: gal te 'dod pas khyab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhan 'dod thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa'o rnam 'grel la 'jug pa'o //🔽'o na ni zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: gal te 'dod pas khyab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhan 'dod thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa'o rnam 'grel la 'jug pa'o // 'o na ni zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa gnyis pa'o //
translated: If it is argued that the word “only” in the statement “The world is pervaded by desire” is meant to exclude all other desires, etc., then the response is that the word “only” in the statement “The world is pervaded by desire” is meant to exclude all other desires, etc.🔽Now, if it is argued that the word “only” in the statement “The world is pervaded by desire” is meant to exclude all other desires, etc., then the response is that the word “only” in the statement “The world is pervaded by desire” is meant to exclude all other desires, etc.

original: ma brjod pa dang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig gi 'dod pa bzlog pa'i don du yang yin no //
analyzed: ma brjod pa dang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig gi 'dod pa bzlog pa'i don du yang yin no //
translated: The second argument is that the word “only” in the statement “The world is pervaded by desire” is meant to exclude all other desires, etc.🔽Now, if it is argued that the word “only” in the statement “The world is pervaded by desire” is meant to exclude all other desires, etc., then the response is that the word “only” in the statement “The world is pervaded by desire” is meant to exclude all other desires, etc.

original: 'dis ni 'dod pa smos pa'i rgol ba gnyis bstan nas gnyis pa mi 'thad do zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'dod pa smos pa'i rgol ba gnyis bstan nas gnyis pa mi 'thad do zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: This shows the two arguments that have been stated, and then says that the second is untenable.

original: mi 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word “not” is the word “not.”

original: phyogs gnyis pa gsal ba na phyogs dang po nye bar sdud pa ni de na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa gsal ba na phyogs dang po nye bar sdud pa ni de na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When the second position is clarified, the first position is summarized.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa smos pa na'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa smos pa na'o //
translated: The word “there” is there.

original: des na bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bzlog pa'i don du rang nyid smos par bya ba ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: des na bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bzlog pa'i don du rang nyid smos par bya ba ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: There, when desire is mentioned, it is not the intention of the treatise-maker to exclude himself.

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is stated by the word “if.”

original: de zhes bya ba bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa ldog pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa ldog pa'o //
translated: The phrase that is not the case rejects the assertion of the treatise author.🔽The phrase I do not assert that rejects the assertion that the treatise author is afraid of debate.

original: rtsod pa smra ba nyid dogs pa bsu bar byed pa nyid 'dod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ste bstan bcos byed pa 'dod pa /🔽rgol ba'i 'dod pa la yin pa nyid na rang nyid smos pas ldog go //
analyzed: rtsod pa smra ba nyid dogs pa bsu bar byed pa nyid 'dod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ste bstan bcos byed pa 'dod pa / rgol ba'i 'dod pa la yin pa nyid na rang nyid smos pas ldog go //
translated: The treatise author's assertion is that the opponent's assertion is the thesis.

original: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa smos pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa smos pa nyid kyis so //
translated: The phrase by that alone refers to the assertion of the opponent.🔽Having taught that the assertion of the opponent, the listener, and the treatise author is the thesis, the phrase I do not assert that rejects it.🔽 Having taught that the assertion of the opponent, the listener, and the treatise author is the thesis, the phrase I do not assert that rejects it.🔽 Having taught that the assertion of the opponent, the listener, and the treatise author is the thesis, the phrase I do not assert that rejects it.

original: de ltar 'dod pa smos pa nyid kyis phyir rgol ba dang / nyan pa po dang @39b bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bsgrub bya yin pa bzlog pa'i phyir rang nyid smos pa don med de zhes bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'dod pa smos pa nyid kyis phyir rgol ba dang / nyan pa po dang @39b bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bsgrub bya yin pa bzlog pa'i phyir rang nyid smos pa don med de zhes bstan nas /
translated: Having taught that the assertion of the opponent, the listener, and the treatise author is the thesis, the phrase I do not assert that rejects it.🔽 Having taught that the assertion of the opponent, the listener, and the treatise author is the thesis, the phrase I do not assert that rejects it.🔽 Having taught that the assertion of the opponent, the listener, and the treatise author is the thesis, the phrase I do not assert that rejects it.🔽 Having taught that the assertion of the opponent, the listener, and the treatise author is the thesis, the phrase I do not assert that rejects it.🔽 Having taught that the assertion of the opponent, the listener, and the treatise author is the thesis, the phrase I do not assert that rejects it.🔽 Having taught that the assertion of the opponent, the listener, and the treatise author is the thesis, the phrase I do not assert that rejects it.🔽 Having taught that the assertion of the opponent, the listener, and the treatise author is the thesis, the phrase I do not assert that rejects it.🔽 Having taught that the assertion of the opponent, the listener, and the treatise author is the thesis, the phrase I do not assert that rejects it.

original: rang nyid smos pa nyid kyis gzhan 'dod pa mtha' dag bzlog par grub pa na slob dpon gyis bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bzlog pa tsam 'bras bur brjod ces smra ba ni /🔽rang nyid smos pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang nyid smos pa nyid kyis gzhan 'dod pa mtha' dag bzlog par grub pa na slob dpon gyis bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bzlog pa tsam 'bras bur brjod ces smra ba ni /🔽rang nyid smos pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Having taught that the assertion of the opponent, the listener, and the treatise author is the thesis, the phrase I do not assert that rejects it.🔽 Having taught that the assertion of the opponent, the listener, and

original: dgos pa 'di gzhung gang gis brjod snyam na rang nyid ces bya ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dgos pa 'di gzhung gang gis brjod snyam na rang nyid ces bya ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you wonder which treatise expresses this purpose, it is this one called “Compendium of the Mahāyāna.”

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Here, “this” refers to

original: gal te 'dod pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod pa la'o //
analyzed: gal te 'dod pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod pa la'o //
translated: the argument beginning with “If it is asserted that . . .”

original: sgra bshad pa zhes bya ba ni slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos so //
analyzed: sgra bshad pa zhes bya ba ni slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos so //
translated: “Explanation of the term” is by master Dignāga.

original: gal te 'grel pa de'i don du yin yang don ni don gzhan yin no snyam na /
analyzed: gal te 'grel pa de'i don du yin yang don ni don gzhan yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that even though it is the meaning of that commentary, the meaning is different,

original: 'di ni de don byas pa yin zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di ni de don byas pa yin zhes gsungs te /
translated: it is stated that “this is its purpose.”

original: de'i don zhes bya ba bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bzlog par bstan pa'i 'bras bur ro //
analyzed: de'i don zhes bya ba bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bzlog par bstan pa'i 'bras bur ro //
translated: The meaning of “that” is the purpose of the treatise, which is taught to be the result of refuting the assertions of the opponent.

original: yang na rang nyid smos pas gzhan gyi 'dod pa thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: yang na rang nyid smos pas gzhan gyi 'dod pa thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir na /
translated: Alternatively, since the author himself states this, it is in order to refute all the assertions of the opponent.

original: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bzlog pa kho na de'i dgos pa yin nam zhes dgos na /
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bzlog pa kho na de'i dgos pa yin nam zhes dgos na /
translated: If you wonder whether the purpose of the treatise is only to refute the assertions of the opponent,

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is stated that “this is its purpose.”

original: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bzlog pa'i 'bras bu de dag la yod pa de la de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bzlog pa'i 'bras bu de dag la yod pa de la de skad ces brjod do //
translated: The result of the desire to compose a treatise is the existence of those, and that is what is referred to.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa rgol ba'i 'dod pa ma yin na bstan bcos dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa rgol ba'i 'dod pa ma yin na bstan bcos dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: If it were not so, then the desire to compose a treatise would not be the desire to refute, and the reason that contradicts the treatise would not be understood.

original: gang gi phyir rnam pa de 'dra bar 'dod pa'i gtan tshigs des na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam pa de 'dra bar 'dod pa'i gtan tshigs des na'o //
translated: Because of the reason that has the desire of that kind,

original: mjug bsdu ba'i sgo nas 'di ni de'i don byas pa yin zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel bas /
analyzed: mjug bsdu ba'i sgo nas 'di ni de'i don byas pa yin zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel bas /
translated: this is the purpose of that, concludes by way of summary.

original: rang nyid smos pas kyang zhes bya ba'i rtsod pa'i lan 'debs pa ni /
analyzed: rang nyid smos pas kyang zhes bya ba'i rtsod pa'i lan 'debs pa ni /
translated: The answer to the dispute, “Also, because of the mention of itself,”

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: is “For that very reason,”

original: dogs pa'i gnas bzlog pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dogs pa'i gnas bzlog pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of the very reversal of the suspected basis.

original: 'o na gzhan gyi 'dod pa ci ltar ldog snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na gzhan gyi 'dod pa ci ltar ldog snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, “Well, how is the desire of the other reversed?”

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is “by the other.”

original: gang gi phyir gzhan gyi 'dod pa ldog pa la log par rtogs pa med pas 'bad pa med pa kho nar grub pa de'i phyir 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan gyi 'dod pa ldog pa la log par rtogs pa med pas 'bad pa med pa kho nar grub pa de'i phyir 'dod pa'o //
translated: Because the other's assertion is refuted without the occurrence of a misconception, it is established without effort, and therefore it is asserted.

original: de nyid yin te zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bzlog pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid yin te zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bzlog pa nyid do //
translated: That very thing is the very refutation of the desire of the treatise-maker.

original: de nyid brjod pa ni ma brjod kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid brjod pa ni ma brjod kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression of that very thing is even though not expressed.

original: gang du rnam pa 'di lta bu bsgrub bya yin par 'dod snyam na /
analyzed: gang du rnam pa 'di lta bu bsgrub bya yin par 'dod snyam na /
translated: Where is it asserted that the probandum is of this sort?

original: 'dod pa smos pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa smos pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression because of the assertion.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam 'grel la 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam 'grel la 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: The expression if and so on introduces the commentary on the Pramānﬁ avārtika.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni 'das pa ma yin pa'i gzhan gyi don byed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni 'das pa ma yin pa'i gzhan gyi don byed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: That very thing is the characteristic of the performance of the purpose of another which is not past.

original: chos dang chos can dag gi zhes bya ba la /🔽chos gzhan gyi don byed pa @40a * //
analyzed: chos dang chos can dag gi zhes bya ba la / chos gzhan gyi don byed pa @40a * //
translated: With regard to the expression of the property and the subject,

original: tsam dang / chos can mig la sogs pa'i'o //
analyzed: tsam dang / chos can mig la sogs pa'i'o //
translated: the property is the mere performance of the purpose of another, and the subject is the eye and so on.

original: gal te khyad par 'di bsgrub bya nyid yin na de'i tshe ci ltar khyad par du 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te khyad par 'di bsgrub bya nyid yin na de'i tshe ci ltar khyad par du 'gyur /
translated: If this distinction is the very probandum, then how could it be a distinction?

original: gang du yang khyad par ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang du yang khyad par ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not to be established as a particular anywhere,

original: spyi bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the universal is what is to be established.

original: 'on te bsgrub par bya ba dang khyad par dag gcig pa'i phyir na khyad par yang bsgrub par bya ba kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te bsgrub par bya ba dang khyad par dag gcig pa'i phyir na khyad par yang bsgrub par bya ba kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But if the object to be established and the particular are the same, then the particular is just what is to be established.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang zhes so //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang zhes so //
translated: The object to be established is the particular.

original: de'i phyir khyad par bsgrub bya ma yin pas na de ci ltar 'dod pa smos pas 'di sgrub par byed /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par bsgrub bya ma yin pas na de ci ltar 'dod pa smos pas 'di sgrub par byed /
translated: Therefore, since the particular is not to be established, how can it be established by the statement of the reason?

original: 'o na khyad par bsgrub bar bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na khyad par bsgrub bar bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But if the particular is not to be established,

original: slob dpon gyis zhes smos so //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis zhes smos so //
translated: then why did the master Dignāga say,

original: gal te khyad par bsgrub par bya ba ma yin na de'i tshe chos kyi khyad par phyin ci log tu bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no zhes slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po ci ltar gsung par 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te khyad par bsgrub par bya ba ma yin na de'i tshe chos kyi khyad par phyin ci log tu bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no zhes slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po ci ltar gsung par 'gyur /
translated: “If the particular is not to be established, then because the particular of the property is established in a contradictory way, it is contradictory”?

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni chos can gyi khyad par phyin ci log par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni chos can gyi khyad par phyin ci log par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The phrase “and so on” includes “because the particular of the subject is established in a contradictory way.”

original: des na khyad par yang bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'dod do zhes rtogs pa yin na /
analyzed: des na khyad par yang bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'dod do zhes rtogs pa yin na /
translated: Therefore, if you think that the distinction is also asserted to be the probandum,

original: rigs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: that is not logical,

original: sngar brjod pa'i nyes pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar brjod pa'i nyes pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the previously mentioned faults would exist.

original: de nas khyad par gyi sgo nas ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa la sogs pa'i nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: de nas khyad par gyi sgo nas ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa la sogs pa'i nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: Then, it is thought that the fault of not having pervasion, etc. would not occur by way of the distinction.

original: de bshad pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bshad pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That is explained

original: gang gi phyir gzhan gyi lan 'di yin pa des na brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan gyi lan 'di yin pa des na brjod pa'o //
translated: means that because this is the response of the other, it is stated.

original: 'dus pa ma yin pa gzhan gyi don byed pa'i mtshan nyid khyad par de ni /
analyzed: 'dus pa ma yin pa gzhan gyi don byed pa'i mtshan nyid khyad par de ni /
translated: That distinction, the characteristic of benefitting others by way of non-aggregation,

original: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po brjod pa tsam bsgrub par bya bar yin par smra ba la ltos nas chos dang chos can dag gi khyad par yin par brjod kyi don dam par ni 'di 'dod pas yul du byas pa yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba kho
analyzed: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po brjod pa tsam bsgrub par bya bar yin par smra ba la ltos nas chos dang chos can dag gi khyad par yin par brjod kyi don dam par ni 'di 'dod pas yul du byas pa yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba kho
translated: is stated to be the distinction of the property-possessor and the property in dependence upon the assertion of the master Dignaga that mere expression is the probandum. But ultimately, because it is the object of the assertion of the other, it is the probandum.

original: na'o // ci ltar gzhan la ltos nas bsgrub par bya ba khyad par du brjod ce na /
analyzed: na'o // ci ltar gzhan la ltos nas bsgrub par bya ba khyad par du brjod ce na /
translated: How is it that the probandum is stated in terms of a distinction based on another?

original: shes rab shin tu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab shin tu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word very in very sharp.

original: pha rol gyis ni grangs can gyis so //
analyzed: pha rol gyis ni grangs can gyis so //
translated: The word other refers to the Sāṃkhya.

original: de don ni bdag gi don to //
analyzed: de don ni bdag gi don to //
translated: The word his refers to the Sāṃkhya.

original: de bsgrub min zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don nyid bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bsgrub min zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don nyid bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The word not means that the Sāṃkhya's own purpose is not to be accomplished.

original: gzhan gyi don nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the purpose of the Sāṃkhya is to accomplish the purpose of another.

original: des bdag dpe la ma grub kyang nyes pa ma yin no zhes gzhan dag sems na /
analyzed: des bdag dpe la ma grub kyang nyes pa ma yin no zhes gzhan dag sems na /
translated: If others think that even if the example is not established, there is no fault,

original: lan ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the response is, Well then.

original: gzhan gyi don de'i khyad par bdag ni don gyi mtshan nyid yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don de'i khyad par bdag ni don gyi mtshan nyid yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The distinction of that other's purpose would be the characteristic of one's own purpose.

original: bdag ni zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'grel ba'o //
analyzed: bdag ni zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'grel ba'o //
translated: The word one's own is an explanation.

original: gal te bdag gi don bsgrub bya ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te bdag gi don bsgrub bya ma yin gyi /
translated: If one's own purpose is not to be accomplished,

original: 'on kyang gzhan gyi don tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin na de'i tshe bdag gi don gyi mtshan nyid khyad par @40b de gzhan gyi don tsam de'i khyad par yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan gyi don tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin na de'i tshe bdag gi don gyi mtshan nyid khyad par @40b de gzhan gyi don tsam de'i khyad par yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if the purpose is to accomplish the mere welfare of others, then the characteristic of one’s own purpose is a distinction of that mere welfare of others.

original: des na 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ni khyad par dang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ni khyad par dang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the reason “because of being a collection” is contradictory to the distinction.

original: 'dus pa ma yin pa'i gzhan gyi don las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus pa ma yin pa'i gzhan gyi don las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it proves the opposite of a non-collection.

original: bdag gi don bsgrub par bya ba yin nam /
analyzed: bdag gi don bsgrub par bya ba yin nam /
translated: Is it to be accomplished for one’s own purpose?

original: gzhan gyi don tsam yin /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don tsam yin /
translated: Or is it merely for the welfare of others?

original: phyogs dang po la ni 'gro ba med pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs dang po la ni 'gro ba med pa'o //
translated: In the first case, there is no going.

original: gnyis pa la ni khyad par dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa la ni khyad par dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: In the second case, there is contradiction with the distinction.

original: smras pa tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes spyir brjod do //
analyzed: smras pa tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes spyir brjod do //
translated: It is said in general that mere speech is to be accomplished.

original: de lta na yang gzhan gyi don nyid sgrub par byed bas ma 'dus pa gzhan gyi don byed pa nyid ma smras kyang bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir grangs can gyi snga phyi 'gal lo //
analyzed: de lta na yang gzhan gyi don nyid sgrub par byed bas ma 'dus pa gzhan gyi don byed pa nyid ma smras kyang bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir grangs can gyi snga phyi 'gal lo //
translated: Even so, since it is established for the sake of others, although it is not stated that it is for the sake of others, it is to be established because it is desired. Therefore, the order of the Sāṃkhya is contradictory.

original: bsgrub bya nyid du zhes bya ba ni slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po 'dod pas yul dang byas pa ma smras pa /
analyzed: bsgrub bya nyid du zhes bya ba ni slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po 'dod pas yul dang byas pa ma smras pa /
translated: The statement it is to be established is the assertion of Master Dignāga. Without mentioning the object and the action,

original: gzhan gyi lugs la ma ltos par rang gi grub pa'i mtha' kho na la gnas nas bsgrub par bya ba nyid du ci ltar mi bsgrub par mi byed /
analyzed: gzhan gyi lugs la ma ltos par rang gi grub pa'i mtha' kho na la gnas nas bsgrub par bya ba nyid du ci ltar mi bsgrub par mi byed /
translated: why would one not establish it as to be established, abiding only in one's own tenets without relying on the system of others?

original: skabs su ma bab pa brjod pa /
analyzed: skabs su ma bab pa brjod pa /
translated: It is said, It is irrelevant.

original: chos kyi khyad par las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pas ci bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos kyi khyad par las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pas ci bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: What is the point of stating it is contradictory and so on, in order to establish the opposite of a property? This is the meaning.

original: 'gog pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not a negation.

original: gzhan la te grangs can la ltos nas so //
analyzed: gzhan la te grangs can la ltos nas so //
translated: In relation to others, that is, in relation to the Sāṃkhya,

original: grangs can ni smras pa tsam bsgrub bya yin par dam bcas nas ma smras pa yang sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: grangs can ni smras pa tsam bsgrub bya yin par dam bcas nas ma smras pa yang sgrub par byed de /
translated: The Sāṃkhya state that the thesis is established merely by stating it, and that even if it is not stated, it is established.

original: des na de'i bsam pa la ltos pa kho nas nyes pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de'i bsam pa la ltos pa kho nas nyes pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the fault is stated only in consideration of their thought.

original: de tsam gyis bya ba ni gzhan la ltos nas lan 'debs pa'i bsam pa tsam gyis gzhan bzlog pa grub pa na /
analyzed: de tsam gyis bya ba ni gzhan la ltos nas lan 'debs pa'i bsam pa tsam gyis gzhan bzlog pa grub pa na /
translated: If the mere statement of the thesis is the object of refutation, then the opponent’s position is established merely by the intention to respond in reliance on another, and the other is refuted.

original: rang gi phyogs ma smras kyang bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin bsgrub pa'i don du sgrub par byed pa 'god pa'i 'bad pa byas pas ci bya /
analyzed: rang gi phyogs ma smras kyang bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin bsgrub pa'i don du sgrub par byed pa 'god pa'i 'bad pa byas pas ci bya /
translated: Even if one’s own position is not stated, the thesis is established. What is the point of making an effort to state a proof for the sake of establishing such a nature?

original: rnam 'grel la 'jug pa'i don du skabs kyi gzhi 'di nges pa ni da ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam 'grel la 'jug pa'i don du skabs kyi gzhi 'di nges pa ni da ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase “now, then” in the root text is for the purpose of introducing the topic of the Pramānﬁ avārtika.

original: gal te de bsgrub par bya ba nyid du ma bstan na da ni ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te de bsgrub par bya ba nyid du ma bstan na da ni ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the thesis is not presented as the object of refutation, then what is?

original: 'o na ci zhig bsgrub par bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhig bsgrub par bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: What is the object of refutation?

original: brjod pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: brjod pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is stated.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni ma brjod pa la bsgrub bar bya ba nyid yin na'o //🔽de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni ma brjod pa la bsgrub bar bya ba nyid yin na'o // de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
translated: Otherwise means that if the unstated is the probandum,

original: ma brjod pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma brjod pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: that itself is clarified by unstated.

original: thams cad bsgrub bya yin mod ci skyon snyam na /
analyzed: thams cad bsgrub bya yin mod ci skyon snyam na /
translated: What is the fault if everything is the probandum?

original: thams cad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba'o //
translated: It is said everything.

original: 'dis ni dpe bsgrub par bya ba ma tshang ba brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis ni dpe bsgrub par bya ba ma tshang ba brjod do //
translated: This expresses the incompleteness of the example's probandum.

original: de lta yin dang gtan tshigs kyi skyon du yang 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni de lta na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta yin dang gtan tshigs kyi skyon du yang 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni de lta na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If that is so, it would also be a fault of the reason. This is expressed by in that case.

original: ci zhig @41a * //
analyzed: ci zhig @41a * //
translated: What is it?

original: bshad snyam na bdag gzhan zhe na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bshad snyam na bdag gzhan zhe na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is thought self and other, it is said self and other.

original: grangs can 'dis gzhan gyi don tsam de nyid do //
analyzed: grangs can 'dis gzhan gyi don tsam de nyid do //
translated: This Sāṃkhya is only for the benefit of others.

original: 'dir ni bsgrub pa'i tshig la'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni bsgrub pa'i tshig la'o //
translated: Here it is in the statement of the probandum.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don gyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don gyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: This self is characterized by one's own benefit.

original: dam pa ste mkhas pa 'gro ba'i tshul lugs la gnas pa dag ni gang gis mthar thug ste /
analyzed: dam pa ste mkhas pa 'gro ba'i tshul lugs la gnas pa dag ni gang gis mthar thug ste /
translated: The excellent ones, the wise ones who abide in the way of the world, by that, ultimately,

original: sgra rnams ci tsam zhig la phyogs brtags nas ngag gi don nges par bya ba la 'jug gi gzhan du ni ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra rnams ci tsam zhig la phyogs brtags nas ngag gi don nges par bya ba la 'jug gi gzhan du ni ma yin pa'o //
translated: elimination of the doubt “What is the meaning of the statement?”🔽The second half of the commentary on the Pramānﬁ avārtika is the
