analyzed: nges pa 'di zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i don bya ba byed ga kho na la khyab par lhag par zhen gyi gzhan lam yin no zhes bya ba'i des pa 'di ci yod de 'ga' yang med do zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: What is the certainty here? There is no certainty at all that it is only that object of action which has such a meaning that is conceived of as pervasive, and not anything else.

original: / rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni me dang du ba dag la khyab pa zhen phar byed pa ni brgyud nas me dang du ba sngon du 'gro ba can yin te /
analyzed: / rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni me dang du ba dag la khyab pa zhen phar byed pa ni brgyud nas me dang du ba sngon du 'gro ba can yin te /
translated: The cause and effect are fire and smoke. The conception of the pervasion is that fire precedes smoke.

original: des na de gnyis la nges pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de gnyis la nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is certainty regarding those two.

original: nges ba zhes bya ba ni me dad du bdag la khyab pa lhag bar zhen pa 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba de nyid ci ltar 'dzin /
analyzed: nges ba zhes bya ba ni me dad du bdag la khyab pa lhag bar zhen pa 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba de nyid ci ltar 'dzin /
translated: Certainty is the result of the excessive adherence to the pervasion of fire and smoke. How is that apprehended?

original: tha snyad ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: tha snyad ces bya ba ni /
translated: The term convention refers to

original: khyab par nges pa me dang du ba dag la nges pa zhes bya ba'i tha snyad gang yin pa 'di nyid las so //
analyzed: khyab par nges pa me dang du ba dag la nges pa zhes bya ba'i tha snyad gang yin pa 'di nyid las so //
translated: the convention of certainty, which is the pervasion of fire and smoke.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba 'dod pa bsgrub bya nyid du brjod pas so //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba 'dod pa bsgrub bya nyid du brjod pas so //
translated: The term this refers to the object of desire, which is the probandum.

original: de las bzlog ba zhes bya ba thal bar byas ba las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las bzlog ba zhes bya ba thal bar byas ba las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The term opposite refers to the opposite of the reductio.

original: ci ltar snyam na ci ltar gtan tshigs 'di zhes smras so //🔽chos can las gzhan gyis khyad par du 'gyur ba'i mi rtag pa nyid gang yin de med pa yang sgrub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: ci ltar snyam na ci ltar gtan tshigs 'di zhes smras so // chos can las gzhan gyis khyad par du 'gyur ba'i mi rtag pa nyid gang yin de med pa yang sgrub par byed pa yin te /
translated: How? How is this reason?

original: bzlog pas khyab par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzlog pas khyab par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The impermanence that is distinguished from the subject is also established, because the opposite is understood to be pervaded.

original: mi rtag pa'i sgra zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i sgra zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The term impermanence refers to

original: gang la mi rtag pa'i sgra yod pa de'i dngos po ste de ltar ni sgra la sgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang la mi rtag pa'i sgra yod pa de'i dngos po ste de ltar ni sgra la sgrub pa ma yin no //
translated: The thing that has the word “impermanent” does not prove sound in that way.

original: de lta bu'i nyid du zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa tsam bsgrub pa kho nas so //
analyzed: de lta bu'i nyid du zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa tsam bsgrub pa kho nas so //
translated: “ In that way” means by merely proving “impermanent.”

original: des na rnam pa de 'dra ba'i spyi'o //
analyzed: des na rnam pa de 'dra ba'i spyi'o //
translated: Therefore, it is a generality of that kind.

original: 'o na gang gi tshe nyes par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gang gi tshe nyes par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Well, when does it become a fault?

original: mi rtag pa tsam zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa tsam zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ Merely impermanent” is the fault.

original: de lta bu nyid du zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig pa'i chos bsgrub pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid du zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig pa'i chos bsgrub pa nyid kyis so //
translated: “ In that way” means by merely proving the property itself.

original: gcig la zhes bya ba ni chos can la gnyis pa mi rtag pa nyid bsgrubs na phan tshun gyi khyad par can tshogs pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig la zhes bya ba ni chos can la gnyis pa mi rtag pa nyid bsgrubs na phan tshun gyi khyad par can tshogs pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “ In one” means that if the second impermanence is proved in the subject, then the collection of mutually different properties is proved.

original: gal te gcig la gnyis pa bsgrubs pas tshogs par 'grub na 'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te gcig la gnyis pa bsgrubs pas tshogs par 'grub na 'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the collection is proved by proving the second in one, then what is the fault?

original: tshogs pa bzlog ba 'ba' zhig 'gal bar 'gyur ba zhig na de las gzhan bzlog pa yang yin te des na sgra'i khyad phar can gyi mi rtag pa nyid la @46b sogs par bsab par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: tshogs pa bzlog ba 'ba' zhig 'gal bar 'gyur ba zhig na de las gzhan bzlog pa yang yin te des na sgra'i khyad phar can gyi mi rtag pa nyid la @46b sogs par bsab par bya ba yin la /
translated: It is only the reversal of the collection that would be contradictory. But it is something other than that. Therefore, impermanence, etc., which are the specific attributes of sound, are to be affirmed.

original: de phyin ci log tu byed pa'i phyir na gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin no zhes gzhan dag sems pa'o //
analyzed: de phyin ci log tu byed pa'i phyir na gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin no zhes gzhan dag sems pa'o //
translated: And because it acts in a contrary way, the reason is contradictory.

original: lan ni de'i sgo nyid nas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni de'i sgo nyid nas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is: “From that very door.”

original: chos kyi khyad par la sogs pa bzlog pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: chos kyi khyad par la sogs pa bzlog pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: From the door of the reversal of the specific attributes of the subject, etc.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
translated: This very point is clarified:

original: gang gi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “That which.”

original: chos kyi khyad par 'gog pa la sogs pa'i dper brjod pa dag ni /
analyzed: chos kyi khyad par 'gog pa la sogs pa'i dper brjod pa dag ni /
translated: The examples of the refutation of the specific attributes of the subject, etc.,🔽are shown in the following lines:🔽The specific attributes of the subject,

original: chos dang chos can khyad par dang // chos can rang gi ngo bo la //🔽zhes bya ba 'di'i nang du ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos dang chos can khyad par dang // chos can rang gi ngo bo la // zhes bya ba 'di'i nang du ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the nature of the subject itself.

original: dogs pa bsu ba ni sgra ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dogs pa bsu ba ni sgra ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The anticipation of an objection is: “Sound.”

original: sgra gang la mi rtag pa'i sgra yad pa zhes tshig sbyar ro //
analyzed: sgra gang la mi rtag pa'i sgra yad pa zhes tshig sbyar ro //
translated: The word “sound” is supplied in the phrase “where the word ‘impermanent’ occurs.”

original: chos can gzhan la zhes bya ba ni chos can sgra gzhan la mi rtag pa'i khyad par can gyi sgra gzhan bsgrub tu med de /
analyzed: chos can gzhan la zhes bya ba ni chos can sgra gzhan la mi rtag pa'i khyad par can gyi sgra gzhan bsgrub tu med de /
translated: “In another subject” means that it is not possible to prove another sound that is qualified by impermanence in another subject, sound.

original: grub pa nyid du rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: grub pa nyid du rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that one realizes that it is already established.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Therefore” means

original: chos can sgra la sgra dang mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi gzhan sgrub pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can sgra la sgra dang mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi gzhan sgrub pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that it is not possible to prove another generality of sound and impermanence in the subject, sound.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rang nyid smos pa don med par phyogs snga ma 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rang nyid smos pa don med par phyogs snga ma 'gog pa'o //
translated: “If” and so on reject the opponent’s position, which is pointless because it is stated by the opponent himself.

original: 'dod pa smos pa nyid kyis rang nyid kyi sgra'i gcad bya bzlog pa'i phyir na rang nyid kyi sgra don med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dod pa smos pa nyid kyis rang nyid kyi sgra'i gcad bya bzlog pa'i phyir na rang nyid kyi sgra don med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since the very statement of the opponent’s position refutes the object of negation of his own statement of sound, the statement of his own position is pointless.

original: kha cig na nge zhes bya ba nas skyon yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ni thams cad kyang rnam 'grel la 'jug ba'i don du rtsod pa byed pa'o //
analyzed: kha cig na nge zhes bya ba nas skyon yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ni thams cad kyang rnam 'grel la 'jug ba'i don du rtsod pa byed pa'o //
translated: “Some say” up to “it is a mistake” is a debate by everyone on the meaning of entering into the Commentary.

original: dam bca' ba ni zhes bya ba nas gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ni rigs pa'i bshad pa'o //🔽rnam 'grel las zhes bya ba ni gsal byed kyi ste /
analyzed: dam bca' ba ni zhes bya ba nas gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ni rigs pa'i bshad pa'o // rnam 'grel las zhes bya ba ni gsal byed kyi ste /
translated: The statement from “The thesis” up to “not otherwise” is the explanation of the reasoning.🔽The statement from “In the Pramānﬁ avārtika” up to “is not otherwise” is the explanation of the scripture.

original: gzhan du ni lung zhes bya ba nas 'di ltar gyi ltag yan chad do //
analyzed: gzhan du ni lung zhes bya ba nas 'di ltar gyi ltag yan chad do //
translated: The statement from “Otherwise, scripture” up to “is not otherwise” is the explanation of the scripture.

original: gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Otherwise,

original: gal te lung gi don ston pa'i phyir dam bca' ba lung yin no zhes mi brjod na da'i lung tshad ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te lung gi don ston pa'i phyir dam bca' ba lung yin no zhes mi brjod na da'i lung tshad ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: if one does not say that scripture is a thesis because it teaches the meaning of scripture, then the statement “Is scripture a valid cognition?”🔽and so on is made.

original: de'i don la zhes bya ba dam bca' ba'i don la gnod na'o //
analyzed: de'i don la zhes bya ba dam bca' ba'i don la gnod na'o //
translated: The meaning of that is the meaning of the thesis.

original: de'i don la gnod na /
analyzed: de'i don la gnod na /
translated: If the meaning of that is undermined,

original: dam bca' ba'i skyon yang yin no zhes 'brel te /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i skyon yang yin no zhes 'brel te /
translated: then the thesis is also faulted.

original: gang gis dam bca' ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba de'i don la gnod pa nyid du ci ltar 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: gang gis dam bca' ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba de'i don la gnod pa nyid du ci ltar 'gyur snyam na /
translated: How could the meaning of that be undermined, by virtue of which the thesis is faulted?

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “Impermanence also” is made.

original: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dang lhan cig sgra la 'du ba mi rtag pa nyid ga la yod pa'i mi rtag pa de nyid bsgrub par bya ba ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dang lhan cig sgra la 'du ba mi rtag pa nyid ga la yod pa'i mi rtag pa de nyid bsgrub par bya ba ste /
translated: How could impermanence, which is the quality of space, be in sound? That impermanence is the thesis.

original: dam bca' ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dam bca' ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the conclusion.

original: de lta yin mod de lta na yang ci ltar dam bca' ba'i nyes pa yin snyam na /🔽ci ltar zhes bya @47a * //
analyzed: de lta yin mod de lta na yang ci ltar dam bca' ba'i nyes pa yin snyam na / ci ltar zhes bya @47a * //
translated: Even though that is so, how is it the fault of the thesis?

original: pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “How?” and so on.

original: bstan bcos la brten pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs rnam pa 'ba' zhig gis sgra de la nas mkha'i yon tan nyid bsgrub par bya ba ltar ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos la brten pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs rnam pa 'ba' zhig gis sgra de la nas mkha'i yon tan nyid bsgrub par bya ba ltar ro //
translated: Because it is based on the treatise, the reason is only of a certain type. Sound is established as having the quality of space.

original: dam bca' ba'i don de bsgrub par bya ba ni de lta bu'i zhes bya ba sgra de la 'du ba'i mi rtag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i don de bsgrub par bya ba ni de lta bu'i zhes bya ba sgra de la 'du ba'i mi rtag pa nyid yin no //
translated: The meaning of the thesis is established as “that kind of impermanence,” which is impermanence in sound.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid do //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid do //
translated: “That” is the quality of space.

original: des ni mi rtag pa nyid sgrub pa'i rtags kyis so //
analyzed: des ni mi rtag pa nyid sgrub pa'i rtags kyis so //
translated: “By that” is by the reason that establishes impermanence.

original: dam bca' ba'i skyon de lung dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i skyon de lung dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: That fault of the thesis is contradicted by scripture.

original: gal te gtan tshigs 'dis mi rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa de ltan yang dag gi bstan bcos kyi de na bkag pas 'gal bar 'gyur ba /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs 'dis mi rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa de ltan yang dag gi bstan bcos kyi de na bkag pas 'gal bar 'gyur ba /
translated: If this reason proves impermanence, then it contradicts the refutation in the authentic treatises.

original: nam mkha' yon tan nyid ci ltar sel bar byed pa yin snyam na /
analyzed: nam mkha' yon tan nyid ci ltar sel bar byed pa yin snyam na /
translated: How does it eliminate space as a quality?

original: 'di ltar zhes smras so //🔽skad cig de ma thag tu 'jig gam /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes smras so // skad cig de ma thag tu 'jig gam /
translated: He says this:🔽Does it disintegrate in the very next moment?

original: dus gzhan du 'jig kyang rung te /
analyzed: dus gzhan du 'jig kyang rung te /
translated: Or does it disintegrate at another time?

original: nam mkha' yon tan nyid rnam par gnas pa ma yin no //🔽des na byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ni /
analyzed: nam mkha' yon tan nyid rnam par gnas pa ma yin no // des na byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ni /
translated: In any case, space does not endure as a quality.

original: bstan bcos la gnod pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no zhes bya pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos la gnod pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no zhes bya pa'i don yin no //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the statement “The reason ‘because it is produced’ is contradictory because it contradicts the treatises” is this.

original: pha rol bo dag rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar nam mkha' 'dzin ba la nye bar mkho ba brjod pa ni rlung gis zhes bya ba'o //🔽de dag gis ni nam mkhas so //
analyzed: pha rol bo dag rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar nam mkha' 'dzin ba la nye bar mkho ba brjod pa ni rlung gis zhes bya ba'o // de dag gis ni nam mkhas so //
translated: The opponent’s statement “Space is the mere absence of obstruction” is a description of the utility of apprehending space in some way.🔽The statement “It is the mere absence of wind” is a description of the utility of apprehending space in another way.

original: des ni zhes bya ba sgra la'o //
analyzed: des ni zhes bya ba sgra la'o //
translated: The statement “It is the mere absence of form” is a description of the utility of apprehending space in yet another way.

original: gang gis nam mkha' 'dzin par ston par rlung gis khyed par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis nam mkha' 'dzin par ston par rlung gis khyed par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is asked how the wind can be distinguished as that which holds up space,

original: de ni de'i rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni de'i rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: it is because it is its very nature.

original: lan ni 'jig rgyu med kyi bar du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni 'jig rgyu med kyi bar du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is that it is as long as there is no cause for its destruction.

original: 'o na rtag par gnas pa rnams la rten yod par 'gyur ro snyam na ba rjod pa /
analyzed: 'o na rtag par gnas pa rnams la rten yod par 'gyur ro snyam na ba rjod pa /
translated: If it is thought that those that endure permanently have a support,🔽it is said:

original: gal te skad cig gnas ba'i sgra la bshad zin pa'i tshul du rten byed pa yin la dus gzhan gnas ba'ang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te skad cig gnas ba'i sgra la bshad zin pa'i tshul du rten byed pa yin la dus gzhan gnas ba'ang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: If sound were to endure for an instant, as has been explained, it would have a support, but it does not endure for another instant.

original: de'i rtag pha dus thams cad du gnas pa la yang rten nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i rtag pha dus thams cad du gnas pa la yang rten nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Nor does it have a support that is permanent, enduring at all times.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir don med pa yin pas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don med pa yin pas so //
translated: Because it is meaningless.

original: des na don dam par na rten dang bcas pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na don dam par na rten dang bcas pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, ultimately, nothing has a support.

original: pha rol po ci skad brjod pa'i su na 'byin pa khas len pas sgra dus gzhan du gnas pa'i phyogs la khyad par nye bar ston ba na rten dang bcas par rtogs pa ni rigs pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: pha rol po ci skad brjod pa'i su na 'byin pa khas len pas sgra dus gzhan du gnas pa'i phyogs la khyad par nye bar ston ba na rten dang bcas par rtogs pa ni rigs pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: The opponent accepts that the sound is the refutation of whatever is expressed. Therefore, when the position that sound endures for another moment is taught, it is reasonable to understand that it has a basis.

original: de bden zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de bden zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is true.

original: brjod ma thag pa sun 'byin ba de'o //🔽de ltan yang /
analyzed: brjod ma thag pa sun 'byin ba de'o // de ltan yang /
translated: The refutation just stated is this.

original: dus cung zad gnas pa'i sgra'i rang bzhin ni rten dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dus cung zad gnas pa'i sgra'i rang bzhin ni rten dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: However, the nature of sound that endures for a little while is the innate nature that has the characteristic of having a basis.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is said.

original: de'i @47b phyir zhes bya ba ni gsal byed kyi lugs nye bar sdud pa'o //
analyzed: de'i @47b phyir zhes bya ba ni gsal byed kyi lugs nye bar sdud pa'o //
translated: Therefore is a summary of the method of clarification.

original: mi rtag pa zhes bya ba skad cig ma nyid du'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa zhes bya ba skad cig ma nyid du'o //
translated: Impermanent means momentary.

original: dus cung zad gnas pa'i mi rtag ba nyid la ni rten dang bcas ba nyid mi 'gal bas gtan tshigs dang dam bca' ba'i nyes par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus cung zad gnas pa'i mi rtag ba nyid la ni rten dang bcas ba nyid mi 'gal bas gtan tshigs dang dam bca' ba'i nyes par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is not contradictory for impermanence that endures for a little while to have a basis, there is no fault in the reason and thesis.

original: gzhan la'ang zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa la yang skabs ma yin ba de ni mtshungs so //
analyzed: gzhan la'ang zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa la yang skabs ma yin ba de ni mtshungs so //
translated: “Also in other cases” means that the same is true of the qualities of space, etc.

original: bzlog pa bsgrub pa la yang skyon du 'gyur ro zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: bzlog pa bsgrub pa la yang skyon du 'gyur ro zhes 'brel to //
translated: The error also occurs in the proof of the contrary.🔽By what is the contrary of that proved?

original: gang gis de las bzlog pa bsgrub ba ma skyon du 'gyur ba /🔽ci ste bsgrub par bya ba yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis de las bzlog pa bsgrub ba ma skyon du 'gyur ba / ci ste bsgrub par bya ba yin nam zhe na /
translated: If it is the probandum,🔽then by what?

original: gang gis phyir zhes bya ba'o //🔽des zhes bya ba bstan bcos kyis brjod pa sgra de'i chos nam mkha'i yon tan nyid gang yin pa de dang 'brel bar gyur pa'i mi rtag pa nyid de ni bsgrub par bya ba yin bde bzhin du bstan bcos byed pas 'dod pa'i dri zhes bya ba sgra
analyzed: gang gis phyir zhes bya ba'o // des zhes bya ba bstan bcos kyis brjod pa sgra de'i chos nam mkha'i yon tan nyid gang yin pa de dang 'brel bar gyur pa'i mi rtag pa nyid de ni bsgrub par bya ba yin bde bzhin du bstan bcos byed pas 'dod pa'i dri zhes bya ba sgra
translated: That is, by what is the probandum proved?🔽The quality of sound that is related to the quality of space, which is expressed by the treatise, is the probandum.

original: chos can la ltos nas chos can gzhan de dang 'brel ba sa'i yon tan nyid 'brel pa nyid kyi bstan bcos te /
analyzed: chos can la ltos nas chos can gzhan de dang 'brel ba sa'i yon tan nyid 'brel pa nyid kyi bstan bcos te /
translated: The treatise is related to the subject in that it is the subject of the treatise, and the quality of earth is related to it.

original: de ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is a treatise because it teaches that.

original: bstan bcos des bsgrubs pa'i mi rtag pa yang bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos des bsgrubs pa'i mi rtag pa yang bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
translated: and impermanence, which is established by that treatise, would also be the probandum.🔽And also when that is refuted,

original: de bkag na yang zhes bya ba ni sa'i yon tan bkag na yang ste /
analyzed: de bkag na yang zhes bya ba ni sa'i yon tan bkag na yang ste /
translated: that is, when the quality of earth is refuted,

original: nam mkha'i yon tan bkag pa 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan bkag pa 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad pa'o //
translated: it is not only the quality of space that is refuted.

original: bstan bcos gang du sgra nam mkha'i yon tan du brjod pa'i bstan bcos de dang 'brel bar bstan pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid mi 'thad do //
analyzed: bstan bcos gang du sgra nam mkha'i yon tan du brjod pa'i bstan bcos de dang 'brel bar bstan pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid mi 'thad do //
translated: Because impermanence is not tenable in a treatise that is connected with a treatise in which sound is described as a quality of space.

original: de'i phyir dam bca' ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir dam bca' ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the fault of the thesis would ensue.

original: chos can zhes bya ba ni sgra'o //
analyzed: chos can zhes bya ba ni sgra'o //
translated: The subject is sound.

original: chos can gzhan du'ang zhes bya ba ni dri la'o //
analyzed: chos can gzhan du'ang zhes bya ba ni dri la'o //
translated: The subject is different is smell.

original: 'chad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'chad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation is if.

original: de'i ste mi rtag pa nyid kyi chos kyi gzhi yin pas te /
analyzed: de'i ste mi rtag pa nyid kyi chos kyi gzhi yin pas te /
translated: That is, the basis of the property of impermanence,

original: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyi gzhi yin pas ni ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyi gzhi yin pas ni ma yin pa'o //
translated: but not the basis of the quality of space.

original: chos gzhan zhes bya ba nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyi rten yin pas kyang skabs su bab pa'o //
analyzed: chos gzhan zhes bya ba nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyi rten yin pas kyang skabs su bab pa'o //
translated: The term “other property” is appropriate because it is the basis of the property of space.

original: lan ni de ltar na zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lan ni de ltar na zhes bya'o //
translated: The response is “In that case . . . .”

original: de'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa'i bstan bcos kyis brjod pa'i chos can sgra zhes bya ba gang yin pa de las chos can gzhan dri de dang 'brel pa'i chos sa'i yon tan nyid de dang 'brel pa yang chos can sgra'i skabs yin pa'i phyir zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa'i bstan bcos kyis brjod pa'i chos can sgra zhes bya ba gang yin pa de las chos can gzhan dri de dang 'brel pa'i chos sa'i yon tan nyid de dang 'brel pa yang chos can sgra'i skabs yin pa'i phyir zhes sbyar ro //
translated: The property of sound, which is the subject expressed by the treatise, is one part of that. The other property, the property of smell, is related to that. The property of being a property of earth is also related to the property of sound, the subject, because it is the context of the property of sound.

original: 'on te yang mi rtag pa nyid kyi chos de'i gzhir gyur ba'i sgra'o //
analyzed: 'on te yang mi rtag pa nyid kyi chos de'i gzhir gyur ba'i sgra'o //
translated: Or, the sound that is the basis of the property of impermanence is the subject.

original: chos gzhan yang zhes @48a * //
analyzed: chos gzhan yang zhes @48a * //
translated: The term “other property”

original: bya ba ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid do //
analyzed: bya ba ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid do //
translated: is the property of space.

original: chos can chos sogs zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos can chos sogs zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The term “property of the subject, etc.”

original: chos can gyis chos yin ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can gyis chos yin ba'i phyir ro //
translated: is because the property is of the subject.

original: spyi'i phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi'i phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is because it is one part of the universal.

original: 'dod pa dang sgrub par byed pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang sgrub par byed pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The term “desire and engagement of the proof” is as follows.

original: spyi'i phyogs gcig gi khyad par nyid ni rtag tu yod pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: spyi'i phyogs gcig gi khyad par nyid ni rtag tu yod pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because the difference of one part of the universal always exists,

original: yod pa tsam gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i 'dod pa 'jug par byed par 'gyur la /
analyzed: yod pa tsam gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i 'dod pa 'jug par byed par 'gyur la /
translated: the desire to prove the mere existence is engaged.

original: de bzhin du byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa yang bsgrub byar sgrub pa'i don tu nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa yang bsgrub byar sgrub pa'i don tu nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And in the same way, the proof of the probandum is applied to the proof of the mere existence, etc.

original: dogs pa bsu ba ni 'on te zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dogs pa bsu ba ni 'on te zhes pa'o //
translated: The anticipation of an objection is “But if . . . ”

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i spyi ni mi rtag pa nyid kyi chos dang bcas pa'i sgra yin la de'i phyogs gcig gi khyad par ni nam mkha'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid kyi chos te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i spyi ni mi rtag pa nyid kyi chos dang bcas pa'i sgra yin la de'i phyogs gcig gi khyad par ni nam mkha'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid kyi chos te /
translated: The universal of the probandum is sound that possesses the property of impermanence; and one part of that, the difference, is the property characterized as the quality of space.

original: der 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is accepted.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba nus pa thogs pa med pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba nus pa thogs pa med pa nyid du'o //
translated: “ In that way” means without obstruction of the capacity.

original: de'i ste skabs kyi 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de'i ste skabs kyi 'bras bu'o //
translated: “ That” refers to the result of the context.

original: sgra mi rtag ste zhes brjod pa las mi rtag pa nyid skabs su bab pa yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste zhes brjod pa las mi rtag pa nyid skabs su bab pa yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: From the statement “Sound is impermanent,” it is understood that impermanence is the context.

original: de ltar na rtogs pa yang de dag gis zhes bya ba'i rnam 'grel gyi cha la rtsod pa nye bar bkod nas lan 'debs pa ni 'dir brjod pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar na rtogs pa yang de dag gis zhes bya ba'i rnam 'grel gyi cha la rtsod pa nye bar bkod nas lan 'debs pa ni 'dir brjod pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, the statement “In that case, the understanding is from those” is the opponent’s position in the autocommentary. The response to that is “Here it is said . . .”

original: 'dod pa la skabs de nyid kyi nus pa yod pa ni tshig las rtogs par 'gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa la skabs de nyid kyi nus pa yod pa ni tshig las rtogs par 'gyur pa yin no //
translated: The desire is understood from the context.

original: de'i phyir na tshig de las skabs rtogs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir na tshig de las skabs rtogs pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, the context is understood from the words.

original: gal te tshig nyid las 'dod pa rtogs kyi skabs las ni ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: gal te tshig nyid las 'dod pa rtogs kyi skabs las ni ma yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that the desire is understood from the words themselves, not from the context,

original: 'dod pa zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'dod pa zhes smos so //
translated: then the word “desire” is stated.

original: tshig las ni 'dod pa tsam zhig rtogs kyi 'dod pa'i khyad par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshig las ni 'dod pa tsam zhig rtogs kyi 'dod pa'i khyad par ni ma yin no //
translated: From the words, only the mere desire is understood, not the specific desire.

original: des na 'dod pa'i don la nges pa nyid du ni skabs las rtogs pa yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: des na 'dod pa'i don la nges pa nyid du ni skabs las rtogs pa yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: Therefore, the specific meaning of the desire is understood from the context.

original: gal te tshig las skabs kyi nus pa na 'dod pa nyid ci ste mi rtogs snyam na /
analyzed: gal te tshig las skabs kyi nus pa na 'dod pa nyid ci ste mi rtogs snyam na /
translated: If you think that if the context is understood from the words, then why is the desire not understood,

original: tshig las ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: tshig las ni zhes smos so //
translated: then the words “from the words” are stated.

original: 'o na skabs 'dod pa'i go bar byed par 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na skabs 'dod pa'i go bar byed par 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: But if you think that the context will make the intended distinction understood,

original: skabs ni shes bya'o //
analyzed: skabs ni shes bya'o //
translated: the context is the object of knowledge.

original: 'o na ji ltar skabs kyis 'dod pa'i khyad par go bar byed snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar skabs kyis 'dod pa'i khyad par go bar byed snyam na /
translated: But if you think that the context will make the intended distinction understood,

original: des na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: then it is said that

original: gang gi phyir tshig gis 'dod pa'i khyad par mi rtogs la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir tshig gis 'dod pa'i khyad par mi rtogs la /
translated: because the words do not convey the intended distinction,

original: nus pa med pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i skabs las kyang ma yin des na'o //🔽skabs gang la tshig gis rtogs pa'i nus pa thogs pa med pa yod pa de la de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: nus pa med pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i skabs las kyang ma yin des na'o // skabs gang la tshig gis rtogs pa'i nus pa thogs pa med pa yod pa de la de skad ces brjod do //
translated: and because the context is not a cause of the absence of capacity,🔽then the context is said to be that in which the words have unimpeded power to convey the intended distinction.

original: 'dod pa'i mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa @48b sgrub pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa @48b sgrub pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la /
translated: In the proof of the impermanence of sound,

original: so sor nges pa gang yin pa de go bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: so sor nges pa gang yin pa de go bar byed pa'o //
translated: the intended distinction is conveyed.

original: sgra zhes bya ba ni rung ba nyid kyi rjes su dpag pa la bsams nas sam /
analyzed: sgra zhes bya ba ni rung ba nyid kyi rjes su dpag pa la bsams nas sam /
translated: The word “only” is stated with the intention of an inference of suitability,

original: gzhan gyis bsam pas brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyis bsam pas brjod pa yin no //
translated: or it is stated with the intention of others.

original: de la re zhig sgra skabs kyis ni nam mkha'i yon tan 'dod pa go bar byed pa ma yin no zhes ston pa ni sgra yang skabs yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la re zhig sgra skabs kyis ni nam mkha'i yon tan 'dod pa go bar byed pa ma yin no zhes ston pa ni sgra yang skabs yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: First, the word “occasion” does not indicate that sound is accepted as a quality of space. The word “occasion” is used to show that.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: nam mkha'i yon tan de la skabs de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan de la skabs de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no occasion for that quality of space.

original: 'o na 'bras bus de 'dod par go ba yin no zhe na 'bras bu tshig ces bya ba'o //🔽de yang zhes bya ba ni sgra mi rtag go zhes bya ba'i tshig de yang nam mkha'i yon tan la med do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na 'bras bus de 'dod par go ba yin no zhe na 'bras bu tshig ces bya ba'o // de yang zhes bya ba ni sgra mi rtag go zhes bya ba'i tshig de yang nam mkha'i yon tan la med do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think that the result is understood as the acceptance of that, the word “result” is used.🔽“ That also” means that the word “impermanent” also does not exist as a quality of space.

original: de lta na yang zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa go par byed pa'i rtags med kyang ngo //
analyzed: de lta na yang zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa go par byed pa'i rtags med kyang ngo //
translated: “ Even though” means that even though there is no reason to understand the acceptance,

original: ci ltar 'bras bu'i rtags med snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'bras bu'i rtags med snyam na /
translated: how is it that there is no reason for the result?

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i zhes smos so //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i zhes smos so //
translated: “ The object to be established” is stated.

original: 'o na ni sgrar 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na ni sgrar 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If you think that it is a result,

original: nus bzhes bya'o //
analyzed: nus bzhes bya'o //
translated: “potential” is used.🔽If you think that it is similar,

original: 'o na ci ste 'dra ba zhig gnod na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ste 'dra ba zhig gnod na /
translated: what is the harm?

original: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs kyi nyes pa yin snyam na med na mi 'byung ba'i zhes smos so //
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs kyi nyes pa yin snyam na med na mi 'byung ba'i zhes smos so //
translated: If you think that this is a fault of the thesis and the reason, [the response is that] the phrase “without which it does not occur” is stated.

original: 'on te mngon sum yang lung la ltos pa kho nas tshad ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te mngon sum yang lung la ltos pa kho nas tshad ma yin no snyam na /
translated: But if you think that even direct perception is a valid cognition only in dependence on scripture,

original: gang cung zad ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang cung zad ces bya ba ste /
translated: [the response is that] “whatever” is stated.

original: lung la mi ltos pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lung la mi ltos pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that [direct perception] does not depend on scripture at all.

original: ci ste zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba'o //
analyzed: ci ste zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba'o //
translated: “But if” is an introduction to a doubt.

original: 'di ga las she na lung gis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ga las she na lung gis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Where is this from?” is “from scripture.”

original: gal te lung la mi ltos par gyur na de'i tshe lung gis mi gnod pa zhig go //
analyzed: gal te lung la mi ltos par gyur na de'i tshe lung gis mi gnod pa zhig go //
translated: If it were not dependent on scripture, then it would not be undermined by scripture.

original: gal te mngon sum lung gis gnod pas 'khrul par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum lung gis gnod pas 'khrul par 'gyur na /
translated: If direct perception is mistaken because it is undermined by scripture,

original: mngon sum gyis gnod pas kyang lung 'khrul par ci ste mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis gnod pas kyang lung 'khrul par ci ste mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: why wouldn’t scripture be mistaken because it is undermined by direct perception?

original: lha ni zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lha ni zhes bya'o //
translated: “The divine eye” is stated.

original: cig shos kyi zhes bya ba ni rab rib med pa'i mthong ba'o //
analyzed: cig shos kyi zhes bya ba ni rab rib med pa'i mthong ba'o //
translated: “The other” is the seeing of one without cataracts.

original: gal te ga la lha mig yin pa ste /
analyzed: gal te ga la lha mig yin pa ste /
translated: “If it is the divine eye” is stated.

original: lung gi tshig kun gyi byed pa po ste yin par grub na de'i tshe kho bo cag la sogs pa'i mngon sum des byas pa'i lung gis gnod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di rigs par 'gyur ba yin na de ltar grub pa yang ma yin te
analyzed: lung gi tshig kun gyi byed pa po ste yin par grub na de'i tshe kho bo cag la sogs pa'i mngon sum des byas pa'i lung gis gnod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di rigs par 'gyur ba yin na de ltar grub pa yang ma yin te
translated: If it were established that the author of all the words of scripture exists, then it would be reasonable to say that scripture composed by that person contradicts direct perception. But that is not established,

original: / phan tshun 'gal ba'i don brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / phan tshun 'gal ba'i don brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it expresses a meaning that is mutually contradictory.🔽But if you think that some of these people have the divine eye,

original: 'on te 'di rnams las 'ga' zhig lha'i mig dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te 'di rnams las 'ga' zhig lha'i mig dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin no snyam na /
translated: then that is not so, because

original: de 'di 'ga' zhig ces bya ba ste /🔽lha'i mig can nam /
analyzed: de 'di 'ga' zhig ces bya ba ste / lha'i mig can nam /
translated: it is not possible that

original: des byas ba'i lung 'ga' zhig go //
analyzed: des byas ba'i lung 'ga' zhig go //
translated: the divine eye or scripture composed by it exists.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni skyes bu'am lung ngo //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni skyes bu'am lung ngo //
translated: “That” refers to the person or the scripture.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni lha'i mig gam des byas @49a * //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni lha'i mig gam des byas @49a * //
translated: “In that way” refers to the divine eye or scripture composed by it.

original: pa'o ; / de ltar ni bdag cag gis gsal bar nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: pa'o ; / de ltar ni bdag cag gis gsal bar nges pa ma yin no //
translated: “In that way” means that we do not ascertain it clearly.

original: 'on te lung byed pa mtha' dag ni thams cad gal yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te lung byed pa mtha' dag ni thams cad gal yin no snyam na /
translated: But if you think that all the authors of scripture are omniscient,

original: tshig phan tshun zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshig phan tshun zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the words “mutually contradictory” apply.

original: gzhan gyis thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Others call it omniscience.

original: khyed cag bas kyang gzhan pa ste ngan pa ni ma yin te 'on kyang khyed pas ni drag go zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyed cag bas kyang gzhan pa ste ngan pa ni ma yin te 'on kyang khyed pas ni drag go zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not that you are worse than others, but rather that you are worse than those who are better than you.

original: des na de dag gi tshig dang mi 'gal bar rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa yin no zhes bya bar bsam pa'o //
analyzed: des na de dag gi tshig dang mi 'gal bar rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa yin no zhes bya bar bsam pa'o //
translated: The idea is that inference is applied without contradicting their words.

original: lan ni de lta na 'on zhas bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni de lta na 'on zhas bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is If that is so, then...

original: lung byed pa thams cad khyed cag pas mi drag rgyu med pa'i phyir lung gcig gi phyogs su lhung bar mi rigs so //
analyzed: lung byed pa thams cad khyed cag pas mi drag rgyu med pa'i phyir lung gcig gi phyogs su lhung bar mi rigs so //
translated: All of your scriptures are not better than ours, because they are without cause. It is not reasonable to fall to one side with just one scripture.

original: de na ci ltar rang gi bstan bcos dang 'gal ba spong ba de bzhin du gzhan gyi bstan bcos dang 'gal ba yang spang bar bya na /
analyzed: de na ci ltar rang gi bstan bcos dang 'gal ba spong ba de bzhin du gzhan gyi bstan bcos dang 'gal ba yang spang bar bya na /
translated: If you avoid contradicting your own treatises in that way, then you should also avoid contradicting the treatises of others.

original: de yang mi nus pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de yang mi nus pa kho na'o //
translated: But that is impossible.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni lung thams cad dang 'gal ba spang bar mi nus bas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni lung thams cad dang 'gal ba spang bar mi nus bas na'o //
translated: Therefore, means because it is impossible to avoid contradicting all scriptures.

original: skye bar mi 'gyur bas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: skye bar mi 'gyur bas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because it does not arise, means

original: spyi la sogs pa rjes su dpag pa 'jug pas sangs rgyas pa'i lung gnod par 'gyur /
analyzed: spyi la sogs pa rjes su dpag pa 'jug pas sangs rgyas pa'i lung gnod par 'gyur /
translated: And because inference would apply to universals and so on, the Buddhist scriptures would be invalidated.

original: spyi med pa'i rjes su dpag pa 'jug na yang gzhan gyi lung la gnod pas so //
analyzed: spyi med pa'i rjes su dpag pa 'jug na yang gzhan gyi lung la gnod pas so //
translated: And if inference were to apply to the absence of universals, the scriptures of others would be invalidated.

original: des na gzhan gyi lugs la rjes su dpag ba mi srid pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na gzhan gyi lugs la rjes su dpag ba mi srid pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, inference is impossible in the system of others.

original: rjes su dpag pa tshad ma ma yin te zhes bya ba ni rtags bstan bcos las gnod par byed pas 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa tshad ma ma yin te zhes bya ba ni rtags bstan bcos las gnod par byed pas 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The statement inference is not a valid means of knowledge is contradictory because it is invalidated by the treatise.

original: de nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: That is stated:

original: bstan bcos dang zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos dang zhes bya'o //
translated: The treatise.

original: phyis zhes bya ba lung dang 'gal ba'i sgo nas bsgrub bya ma grub par mi 'gyur ba'o //🔽de dang zhes bya ba rjes su dpag pas grub pa dang 'gal ba'i lung ngo //
analyzed: phyis zhes bya ba lung dang 'gal ba'i sgo nas bsgrub bya ma grub par mi 'gyur ba'o // de dang zhes bya ba rjes su dpag pas grub pa dang 'gal ba'i lung ngo //
translated: Later means that the probandum would not be established by way of contradicting scripture.🔽That means the treatise that is established by inference contradicts scripture.

original: khas blangs pa la zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa'i bstan bcos la ltos nas bstan bcos dang 'gal bar yang 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: khas blangs pa la zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa'i bstan bcos la ltos nas bstan bcos dang 'gal bar yang 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Acceptance means that in dependence on the accepted treatise, there would be contradiction with the treatise.

original: gzhan du ni zhes bya ba khas ma blangs pa'i bstan bcos la ltos nas ni ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni zhes bya ba khas ma blangs pa'i bstan bcos la ltos nas ni ma yin pa'o //
translated: Otherwise, i.e., in a treatise that is not accepted, it is not so.

original: thams cad la zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad la zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In all cases, i.e., in the absence of a definite reason.

original: gzhan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: Anticipating an objection, he says:

original: rtag mi bzod pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtag mi bzod pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “because of the intolerance of permanence.”

original: nges pa'i bstan bcos khas len pa'i rgyu ni rtag pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i bstan bcos khas len pa'i rgyu ni rtag pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The reason for accepting a definite treatise is permanence.

original: tshad ma yin la zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma yin la zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is a valid means of knowledge, because it is of the nature of inference.

original: brtag pa de nyid kyang khas blangs pa des so //
analyzed: brtag pa de nyid kyang khas blangs pa des so //
translated: That very investigation is accepted by that acceptance.

original: 'di la bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di la bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea here is this:

original: gal te brtag par 'os pa kho na khas blang bar @49b brjod na /
analyzed: gal te brtag par 'os pa kho na khas blang bar @49b brjod na /
translated: If it is said that only what is worthy of investigation is accepted,

original: de'i tshe khas blangs pas brtag pa gnod par byed do zhes khas blang bar mi bya bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: de'i tshe khas blangs pas brtag pa gnod par byed do zhes khas blang bar mi bya bar 'gyur na /
translated: then, at that time, it would be unacceptable to say that investigation is undermined by acceptance.

original: khyod kyi 'dod pas ni khas blangs pas brtag pa la gnod pa yang yin te /
analyzed: khyod kyi 'dod pas ni khas blangs pas brtag pa la gnod pa yang yin te /
translated: But by your assertion, investigation is undermined by acceptance.

original: sgra mi rtag par rjes su dpog pa la nam mkha'i yon tan nyid du ston pa'i bstan bcos kyis gnod par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag par rjes su dpog pa la nam mkha'i yon tan nyid du ston pa'i bstan bcos kyis gnod par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because you accept that the treatise that teaches that sound is a quality of space invalidates the inference of the impermanence of sound.

original: de'i tshe ni rtogs pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe ni rtogs pa'i dus na'o //
translated: “At that time” means at the time of understanding.

original: de ni bstan bcos so //
analyzed: de ni bstan bcos so //
translated: “That” refers to the treatise.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos la mi ltos pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos la mi ltos pa'i dus na'o //
translated: “At that time” means at the time when one does not rely on the treatise.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'i dus na'o //🔽khas blangs med phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'i dus na'o // khas blangs med phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “At that time” means at the time of debate.

original: bstan bcos khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Because there is no acceptance” means because one does not accept the treatise.

original: khas len par bya ba la thabs te rgyu'o //
analyzed: khas len par bya ba la thabs te rgyu'o //
translated: “In the acceptance” means in the cause.

original: 'di nyid ni dpyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni dpyod pa'o //
translated: This is the analysis.

original: de tshe ste rtsod pa'i dus na khas blangs pa de yod kyang ste /
analyzed: de tshe ste rtsod pa'i dus na khas blangs pa de yod kyang ste /
translated: Even if that is, that is, even if the acceptance exists at the time of debate,

original: yod pa yin pa yang brtag pa la gnod pa'i yan lag min te rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa yin pa yang brtag pa la gnod pa'i yan lag min te rgyu ma yin no //
translated: that existence is not a limb of the refutation of the analysis, it is not a reason.

original: gal te de tsam gyis yongs su mtshim  na zhes bya ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i spyod yul tsam gyis thar pa 'dod pa dag phung po gsum pa med par yongs su ma tshim na'o //
analyzed: gal te de tsam gyis yongs su mtshim  na zhes bya ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i spyod yul tsam gyis thar pa 'dod pa dag phung po gsum pa med par yongs su ma tshim na'o //
translated: If one is not satisfied with just that, i.e., with the mere objects of direct perception and inference, then one is not satisfied with the nonexistence of a third alternative.

original: ci'i phyir de'i tshe bstan bcos kyis gnod snyam na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de'i tshe bstan bcos kyis gnod snyam na /
translated: Why is it that the treatise is refuted at that time?

original: gang gi phyir gnas gsum par ni 'pho ba na ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gnas gsum par ni 'pho ba na ste /
translated: Because, when one has advanced to the third stage,

original: 'pho ba'i don du bstan bcos len par rigs ldan yin te /
analyzed: 'pho ba'i don du bstan bcos len par rigs ldan yin te /
translated: it is proper to take up the treatise for the sake of advancement.

original: des na de nyid kyi tshe bstan bcos kyis gnod kyi gzhan gyi tshe ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de nyid kyi tshe bstan bcos kyis gnod kyi gzhan gyi tshe ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the treatise is refuted at that time, but not at any other time.

original: ci ltar na bstan bcos yongs su 'dzin pa yang de'i rgyu mtshan yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar na bstan bcos yongs su 'dzin pa yang de'i rgyu mtshan yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that the possession of the treatise is also the reason for that?

original: des grub don la zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des grub don la zhes bya'o //
translated: It is said that one should understand the meaning established by it.

original: gal te gnas gsum par 'pho ba na bstan bcos khas mi len na /
analyzed: gal te gnas gsum par 'pho ba na bstan bcos khas mi len na /
translated: If one does not accept the treatise when one has advanced to the third stage,

original: de'i tshe des grub pa'i don rnams la /
analyzed: de'i tshe des grub pa'i don rnams la /
translated: then it is not proper to think that the meaning established by it

original: bstan bcos dang 'gal bar sems pa yang mi rung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bstan bcos dang 'gal bar sems pa yang mi rung bar 'gyur te /
translated: contradicts the treatise.

original: chos can ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the subject is not established.

original: gal te brtag pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi khas len pa yang des grub pa'i don rnams la sems pa ci ltar 'thad snyam na /
analyzed: gal te brtag pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi khas len pa yang des grub pa'i don rnams la sems pa ci ltar 'thad snyam na /
translated: If you think, “How could it be tenable that the thought of objects that are established by that precedes the assertion?”

original: brtags nas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: brtags nas zhes bya'o //
translated: It is said, “Having analyzed.”🔽How could it contradict that assertion?

original: de ni ci ltar de la dam bcas gnod ces bya ba ni rgol ba de dang 'brel ba'i bstan bcos tshad mas grub pa'i mi rtag pa nyid ston par byed pa de la /
analyzed: de ni ci ltar de la dam bcas gnod ces bya ba ni rgol ba de dang 'brel ba'i bstan bcos tshad mas grub pa'i mi rtag pa nyid ston par byed pa de la /
translated: If you think, “The assertion that sound is impermanent contradicts the treatise that is the basis of the assertion,” that is not so.

original: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid du dam bca' bas ci ltar gnod de mi gnod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid du dam bca' bas ci ltar gnod de mi gnod pa kho na'o //
translated: How could the assertion that sound is a quality of space contradict that? It could not!

original: 'on te yang bstan bcos rtogs pa des na de la dam bca' bas gnod do snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te yang bstan bcos rtogs pa des na de la dam bca' bas gnod do snyam na /
translated: If you think, “The treatise is understood through that, and therefore the assertion contradicts it,”

original: bstan bcos des la slar yang brtag par bya ba ma yin te brtags zin pha'i phyir ro /🔽gal te de ltar @50a * //
analyzed: bstan bcos des la slar yang brtag par bya ba ma yin te brtags zin pha'i phyir ro / gal te de ltar @50a * //
translated: that treatise would not be analyzed again, because it has already been analyzed.

original: na yang rtog na ni /
analyzed: na yang rtog na ni /
translated: If you think, “Even so, if it is analyzed,

original: de'i tshe bstan bcos de ni sngar brtags par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe bstan bcos de ni sngar brtags par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: at that time that treatise would not have been analyzed previously.”

original: yang zhes bya ba ni ma brtags par bstan bcos khas blangs par yang ngo //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni ma brtags par bstan bcos khas blangs par yang ngo //
translated: “Also” means that the treatise is accepted without examination.

original: tshad mas grub ba zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshad mas grub ba zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
translated: “Established by a valid cognition” means impermanence.

original: tshad mas ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid do //
analyzed: tshad mas ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid do //
translated: “Not established by a valid cognition” means the quality of space.

original: gsum pa las gzhan du zhes bya ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i yul la'o //
analyzed: gsum pa las gzhan du zhes bya ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i yul la'o //
translated: “Other than the three” means the objects of perception and inference.

original: gal te de ni zhes bsgrub par bya ba mi rtag ba nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te de ni zhes bsgrub par bya ba mi rtag ba nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: “If that” refers to the probandum, such as impermanence.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: “If” and so on is the objection.

original: gal te bstan bcos khas mi len na de'i tshe bstan bcos kyis gnod par dogs pa'i don zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos kyis gnod par byas pa'o //
analyzed: gal te bstan bcos khas mi len na de'i tshe bstan bcos kyis gnod par dogs pa'i don zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos kyis gnod par byas pa'o //
translated: “If one does not accept the treatise, then the meaning that is feared to be contradicted by the treatise” means that the treatise contradicts.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni len no //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni len no //
translated: “No, because” and so on is the response.

original: tshad mas grub pa mi rtag pa nyid na'o //
analyzed: tshad mas grub pa mi rtag pa nyid na'o //
translated: “Established by a valid cognition” is impermanence.

original: tshad mas grub pa ni mi gnod pas ldog pa ma yin te des na des bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs par brjod ba'o //
analyzed: tshad mas grub pa ni mi gnod pas ldog pa ma yin te des na des bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs par brjod ba'o //
translated: It is not refuted by valid cognition, and therefore it is not reversed. Thus, it is not established by that. This is illogical.

original: bstan bcos dang skyes bu 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos dang skyes bu 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no connection between the treatise and the person.

original: 'o na bstan bcos de skyes pa yin par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na bstan bcos ni yon tan dang ldan pas de yul gsum yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan bas skyes bu'i yin no //
analyzed: 'o na bstan bcos de skyes pa yin par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na bstan bcos ni yon tan dang ldan pas de yul gsum yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan bas skyes bu'i yin no //
translated: Well then, how could the treatise be produced? The treatise is produced by the person who possesses the three pure objects, because it possesses the characteristics.

original: yon tan dang ldan pa'i bstan bcos ni ldog pa dang ldan pas 'dzin gyi yon tan dang mi ldan pa ni mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan dang ldan pa'i bstan bcos ni ldog pa dang ldan pas 'dzin gyi yon tan dang mi ldan pa ni mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a treatise that possesses good qualities is accepted because it possesses reversal, but one that does not possess good qualities is not accepted.

original: ci ltar 'brel pa med snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'brel pa med snyam na /
translated: How is there no connection?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is like this.

original: 'o na de ni yon tan dang ldan ba nyid kyis de'i zhe na yon tan nyes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na de ni yon tan dang ldan ba nyid kyis de'i zhe na yon tan nyes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Well then, it is said that it is produced by the one who possesses good qualities. Good qualities are faults.

original: gal te bstan bcos ma yin na 'on 'di ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te bstan bcos ma yin na 'on 'di ci yin zhe na /
translated: If it is not a treatise, then what is it?

original: grub pa mtha' zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: grub pa mtha' zhes gsungs so //
translated: This is the ultimate of the two truths.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za ba las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za ba las so //
translated: From that means from the inevitable.

original: 'dis ni phyed phyi ma bshad nas phyed snga ma 'chad ba ni /
analyzed: 'dis ni phyed phyi ma bshad nas phyed snga ma 'chad ba ni /
translated: Having explained the latter half, he explains the former half:

original: lhan cig ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: lhan cig ces bya ba ste /
translated: Simultaneously means

original: skyes bu dang bstan bcos dag gi lhan cig skyes pa'i 'brel ba nyid las so //
analyzed: skyes bu dang bstan bcos dag gi lhan cig skyes pa'i 'brel ba nyid las so //
translated: from the simultaneous connection of the person and the treatise.

original: de ldan ni lung dang ldan ba'o //
analyzed: de ldan ni lung dang ldan ba'o //
translated: Possessing that means possessing scripture.

original: lung gis tshad ma la gnod na tshad ma dor ba'i phyir na yon tan dang skyon rnam par dbye ba med par 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: lung gis tshad ma la gnod na tshad ma dor ba'i phyir na yon tan dang skyon rnam par dbye ba med par 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: If scripture contradicts valid cognition, then valid cognition should be abandoned, and therefore the distinction between good qualities and faults would not exist. This is what is said:

original: tshad ma zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshad ma zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Valid cognition.

original: de dang zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos dang 'gal ba spang ba'i de dang rjes su mthun pa'i dpes so //
analyzed: de dang zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos dang 'gal ba spang ba'i de dang rjes su mthun pa'i dpes so //
translated: That refers to the example that is consistent with that, which is the avoidance of contradiction with the treatise.

original: tshad ma ma yin pa nyid na yang 'gal ba spangs pa ma yin te zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin pa nyid na yang 'gal ba spangs pa ma yin te zhes 'brel to //
translated: Even if it is not valid cognition, it is not the avoidance of contradiction. This is the connection.

original: chos can de nyid ces bya ba chos can sgras de nyid kyi @50b chos nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la mi rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa'i byas ba nyid kyis gnod na /
analyzed: chos can de nyid ces bya ba chos can sgras de nyid kyi @50b chos nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la mi rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa'i byas ba nyid kyis gnod na /
translated: The phrase “that very phenomenon” means that the quality of impermanence, which is being used to prove that sound is impermanent, is undermined by the quality of being a product, which is a property of sound itself.

original: brjod pa la ste mi rtag pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: brjod pa la ste mi rtag pa la yang ngo //
translated: The response to that is: “It is the same for impermanence.”

original: 'on te mi rtag pa nyid 'di ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyis sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te mi rtag pa nyid 'di ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyis sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: If you say that the quality of impermanence is being used to prove that sound is a quality of space,

original: des na gnod par byed pa ni zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na gnod par byed pa ni zhes bya'o //
translated: then the response is: “It is undermined.”

original: de las gzhan zhes bya ba me sgrub par byed pas me med pa la gnod par bya ba'o //🔽'brel pa med na chos nam mkha'i yon tan nyid ma grub pas mi rtag ba nyid ma grub par ni ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de las gzhan zhes bya ba me sgrub par byed pas me med pa la gnod par bya ba'o // 'brel pa med na chos nam mkha'i yon tan nyid ma grub pas mi rtag ba nyid ma grub par ni ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: The phrase “from something else” means that the proof of fire is undermined by the absence of smoke.🔽If there is no relation between the two, then how could the nonestablishment of the quality of being a product, which is a quality of space, undermine the establishment of impermanence?

original: de grub yin na te mi rtag pa nyid grub pa yin na /
analyzed: de grub yin na te mi rtag pa nyid grub pa yin na /
translated: If the quality of impermanence is established,

original: mi rtag pa nyid de bsgrub par brjod pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid de bsgrub par brjod pa'o //
translated: then the quality of impermanence is said to be established.

original: gang gis de skad brjod pa de ltar mthong ba yod dam ci snyam na /
analyzed: gang gis de skad brjod pa de ltar mthong ba yod dam ci snyam na /
translated: If someone were to say that, then is there anyone who sees it that way?

original: du ba gcig gis kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: du ba gcig gis kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: and by one smoke, etc.

original: 'gal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: The argument is that it is contradictory.

original: me dang grang ba'i reg pa dag 'gal ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: me dang grang ba'i reg pa dag 'gal ba'i phyir na /
translated: Because heat and cold are contradictory,

original: du bas grang ba dang 'gal ba'i me sgrub par byed kyang du ba 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin no //🔽'gal ba mtshungs so zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid du gyur na yon tan nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: du bas grang ba dang 'gal ba'i me sgrub par byed kyang du ba 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin no // 'gal ba mtshungs so zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid du gyur na yon tan nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: smoke establishes fire, which is contradictory with cold, but smoke is not a fallacious reason that is contradictory.🔽The reply is that the contradiction is similar.

original: yon tan dang yon tan can gyi dngos po ni rtag pa'i dngos po la yin no //
analyzed: yon tan dang yon tan can gyi dngos po ni rtag pa'i dngos po la yin no //
translated: If it is impermanent, it cannot be a quality because the relation of quality to a substratum is a relation of permanent to permanent.

original: dngos po mi rtag pa dang / dngos po med pa nam mkha'i yon tan dag go //
analyzed: dngos po mi rtag pa dang / dngos po med pa nam mkha'i yon tan dag go //
translated: A thing that is impermanent and a non-thing, such as the quality of space, are not qualities.

original: de'i zhes bya ba bstan bcos las brjod pa nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa'i chos nye bar blangs pa med par ro //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba bstan bcos las brjod pa nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa'i chos nye bar blangs pa med par ro //
translated: The commentary states that the quality of space, etc., are not qualities because they are not mentioned in the treatise.

original: de las te sems pa can dang me la sogs pa las gzhan pa'i chos sems pa med pa dang / me ma yin pa la sems pa'o //
analyzed: de las te sems pa can dang me la sogs pa las gzhan pa'i chos sems pa med pa dang / me ma yin pa la sems pa'o //
translated: From that, i.e., from the mind and from fire, etc., other things, which are not mind and not fire, are conceived.

original: 'bras bu dang khyab bya'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de ni 'dod pa'i bsgrub par bya ba me dang shing gi mtshan nyid kyi don dang / med na mi 'byung bar tshad mas rtogs pa'i phyir rgol ba gzhan dag 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs des ci ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu dang khyab bya'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de ni 'dod pa'i bsgrub par bya ba me dang shing gi mtshan nyid kyi don dang / med na mi 'byung bar tshad mas rtogs pa'i phyir rgol ba gzhan dag 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs des ci ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: The nature of the effect and the pervader is the object of the definition of the probandum, fire and fuel, and the non-occurrence of the effect is understood by means of a valid cognition. Therefore, how can the other disputants understand the effect and the nature reason?

original: rtogs par 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don te //
analyzed: rtogs par 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don te //
translated: It is the meaning that they do understand.

original: nus pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nus pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for the word “ability,”

original: nus pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyu las gzhan gang yin pa tha mar ma gyur ba 'bras su skyed pa zhugs pa ni de ni bzlog par nus pa'o //
analyzed: nus pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyu las gzhan gang yin pa tha mar ma gyur ba 'bras su skyed pa zhugs pa ni de ni bzlog par nus pa'o //
translated: that which is not other than the unobstructed cause, which is not the last, which is engaged in producing the effect, that is the ability.

original: shes par byed pa yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: shes par byed pa yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: The informer is also like that.

original: shes par byed pa ni rtogs pa skyed pa bzlog par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes par byed pa ni rtogs pa skyed pa bzlog par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: The means of cognition is not capable of reversing the production of understanding.

original: su la rtogs pa skyed pa zhe na /
analyzed: su la rtogs pa skyed pa zhe na /
translated: To whom is the production of understanding?

original: tshul gsum rtogs pa'i skyes bu la'o //
analyzed: tshul gsum rtogs pa'i skyes bu la'o //
translated: To the person who understands the three modes.

original: de nyid kyis ni skyes bu nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni skyes bu nyid kyis so //
translated: By that very person, by the person himself.

original: rtags las te gtan tshigs las /
analyzed: rtags las te gtan tshigs las /
translated: From the reason, from the logical proof.

original: @51a * // gal te bsgrub par bya ba mi nges te mi rtogs na de'i tshe skyes bu mi 'dod bzhin du ni /
analyzed: @51a * // gal te bsgrub par bya ba mi nges te mi rtogs na de'i tshe skyes bu mi 'dod bzhin du ni /
translated: If the probandum is not ascertained, not understood, then at that time, the person, unwillingly,

original: mes tshig bar gyur ba tshig pa'i sdug bsngal la 'dod pa rab tu bzlog par 'gyur ro //🔽khyad par gyis zhes bya ba ni sgrub par bya ba ltos te sgrub par byed pa'i mi 'khrul ba nyid de des na bsgrub bar bya ba ni khyad par yin la /
analyzed: mes tshig bar gyur ba tshig pa'i sdug bsngal la 'dod pa rab tu bzlog par 'gyur ro // khyad par gyis zhes bya ba ni sgrub par bya ba ltos te sgrub par byed pa'i mi 'khrul ba nyid de des na bsgrub bar bya ba ni khyad par yin la /
translated: is burned by fire, and the desire for the suffering of being burned is completely reversed.🔽The qualifier is the non-deceptiveness of the proof in relation to the probandum. By that, the probandum is the qualifier,

original: sgrub par byed pa'i mi 'khrul ba nyid ni khyad par dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i mi 'khrul ba nyid ni khyad par dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: and the non-deceptiveness of the proof is the one possessing the qualifier.

original: med na mi 'byung bar rtogs pa ni bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa med na mi 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung bar rtogs pa ni bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa med na mi 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the realization of the non-apprehension of the probandum is the non-apprehension of the realization of the probandum.

original: gzhan gyis smras pa de ma thag par brjod pa thams cad yin mod kyi ste de ltar bden yang 'on te bstan bcos dang 'gal ba'i sgrub pa'i phyir na rgol ba mi rigs pa byed par 'gyur ro zhe'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis smras pa de ma thag par brjod pa thams cad yin mod kyi ste de ltar bden yang 'on te bstan bcos dang 'gal ba'i sgrub pa'i phyir na rgol ba mi rigs pa byed par 'gyur ro zhe'o //
translated: Although all of the statements of the opponent are correct, still, because the proof contradicts the treatise, the opponent is acting improperly.

original: 'gal na zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos 'gal na'o //
analyzed: 'gal na zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos 'gal na'o //
translated: If there is a contradiction, i.e., if the treatise is contradicted,

original: rgol bas 'dir mi rigs pa ci byas /
analyzed: rgol bas 'dir mi rigs pa ci byas /
translated: what is the impropriety of the opponent here?

original: des ni rgol bas so //
analyzed: des ni rgol bas so //
translated: The opponent says,

original: de zhes bya ba ni byas pa la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni byas pa la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs so //
translated: “that” refers to the reason of being produced, etc.

original: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos la gnod pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos la gnod pa'o //
translated: “Such” refers to the contradiction with the treatise.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba bstan bcos la mi gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba bstan bcos la mi gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Otherwise” refers to the absence of contradiction with the treatise.

original: 'dod pa de bsgrub pa'i phyir na byas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs 'dir skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: 'dod pa de bsgrub pa'i phyir na byas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs 'dir skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
translated: Because of that, the reason of the characteristic of being produced is not faulty here.

original: byas pa nyid 'dir ni nyes pa med de bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byas pa nyid 'dir ni nyes pa med de bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, there is no fault in the use of the reason “because it is produced,” because it establishes the probandum.

original: 'o na gang gi tsho nyes pa yod snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na gang gi tsho nyes pa yod snyam na /
translated: But if you think, “When is there a fault?”

original: byas pa'i gtan tshigs 'dir ni ma brjod pa nyid ni rgol ba'i skyon yin no //
analyzed: byas pa'i gtan tshigs 'dir ni ma brjod pa nyid ni rgol ba'i skyon yin no //
translated: The non-mention of the reason “because it is produced” is a fault of the challenger.

original: 'dir yang zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams la yang ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams la yang ro //
translated: Here, “also” means that it is also the case with fallacious reasons.

original: sgrub par byed pa yang ni byas pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa yang ni byas pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The proof” is “because it is produced,” etc.

original: gal te nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyi gnod byed ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs kyang yod par srid pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyi gnod byed ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs kyang yod par srid pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t it possible that there is a reason that is not a reason that undermines the property of the subject, such as “because it is a quality of space”?

original: des na de ma brjod pa yang nyes pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: des na de ma brjod pa yang nyes pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: So, the non-mention of that is also a fault.

original: 'dir ni zhes smos te mi rtag pa nyid du sgrub pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes smos te mi rtag pa nyid du sgrub pa la'o //
translated: Here, “in this case” means in the proof of sound as impermanent.

original: gnod par byed pa kho na srid pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa kho na srid pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is possible that it is only a reason that undermines the property of the subject.

original: de nyid kyis te bstan bcos kyi don du gyur pa nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyis ma nges pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis te bstan bcos kyi don du gyur pa nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyis ma nges pa'i phyir te /
translated: By that alone, the reason “because it is a quality of space” is not established as the meaning of the treatise, because it is not ascertained.

original: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid bzhin du mi rtag pa med kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid bzhin du mi rtag pa med kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, like the qualities of space, it is not impermanent, yet it exists.

original: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i rigs pa gzhan yang ngo //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i rigs pa gzhan yang ngo //
translated: Other reasonings such as impermanence are also the same.

original: 'ga' zhig nyid la ni nam mkha'i yon tan can gyi bstan bcos la'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig nyid la ni nam mkha'i yon tan can gyi bstan bcos la'o //
translated: In some treatises, the qualities of space are taught.

original: de ni 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: de ni 'gal ba'o //
translated: That is contradictory.

original: 'di la ni mi rtag pa la'o //
analyzed: 'di la ni mi rtag pa la'o //
translated: Here, impermanence is taught.

original: mi rigs pa ni nam mkha'i yon tan no //
analyzed: mi rigs pa ni nam mkha'i yon tan no //
translated: The qualities of space are unreasonable.

original: rigs @51b pa ni mi rtag pa la'o //
analyzed: rigs @51b pa ni mi rtag pa la'o //
translated: Impermanence is reasonable.

original: skabs kyi zhes bya ba mi rtag pa nyid dang 'brel ba tsam la byas pa ltos pa'o //
analyzed: skabs kyi zhes bya ba mi rtag pa nyid dang 'brel ba tsam la byas pa ltos pa'o //
translated: The context is merely the connection with impermanence.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bstan bcos thams cad dang mi 'gal bas sgrub par byed pa ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bstan bcos thams cad dang mi 'gal bas sgrub par byed pa ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, since it would not contradict any treatise, it would be impossible to establish.

original: gzhan la yang zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos kyi don las gzhan pa la yang mi 'gal bar bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan la yang zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos kyi don las gzhan pa la yang mi 'gal bar bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: Also, in other contexts, the meaning of the treatise would not be contradicted.

original: skabs ma yin par khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skabs ma yin par khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there would be no difference in the context.

original: bstan bcos kyang 'gal ba yang ste bstan bcos kyi don las gzhan gyi 'gal ba 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad pa'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos kyang 'gal ba yang ste bstan bcos kyi don las gzhan gyi 'gal ba 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad pa'o //
translated: The treatise is also contradictory, and not only contradictory to the meaning of the treatise.

original: byas pa yin na zhes bya ba ni dang por khas blangs pa byas pa yin na'o //
analyzed: byas pa yin na zhes bya ba ni dang por khas blangs pa byas pa yin na'o //
translated: If it is produced,

original: phyis kyang ste tshad ma dang 'ga' na'o //
analyzed: phyis kyang ste tshad ma dang 'ga' na'o //
translated: it is also later, when the valid cognition is produced.

original: gal te 'di ni gzhan dag kyang 'dod pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te 'di ni gzhan dag kyang 'dod pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t this also accepted by others?

original: des na brjod pa 'dis ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: des na brjod pa 'dis ci bya zhe na /
translated: Then what is the point of this statement?

original: pha rol po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pha rol po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The opponent is the one who accepts that.

original: 'dod pa nyid ston pa ni dam bca' ba zhes bya ba nas zhe'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa nyid ston pa ni dam bca' ba zhes bya ba nas zhe'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
translated: The statement of what is accepted is from “thesis” up to “it is not produced.”

original: 'di la yang nyes pa sngar brjod zin pas yang mi brjod do //
