analyzed: mngon sum du gyur pa'i don de ni rjes su dpag pa dang sgra dag gi yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you think, The object that is manifest is not the object of inference and verbal testimony,

original: lan ni de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the answer is For that very reason.

original: gcig tu zhen ba'i phyir mngon sum rjes su dpag pas bsal bar dogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gcig tu zhen ba'i phyir mngon sum rjes su dpag pas bsal bar dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of exclusive adherence, there is the fear of being refuted by inference.

original: des na 'di ma 'brel pa brjod pa nyid kyis zlog par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: des na 'di ma 'brel pa brjod pa nyid kyis zlog par byed pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is refuted by the mere fact that it is not connected.

original: gang gi phyir rjes su dpag pa las ni bsal ba'i don gang du yang bkag pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rjes su dpag pa las ni bsal ba'i don gang du yang bkag pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because there is no negation of any object that is excluded by inference.

original: des na ci ltar mngon sum rjes su dpag pas bsal bar ci ltar dogs zhes bya ba'i skyon med do //
analyzed: des na ci ltar mngon sum rjes su dpag pas bsal bar ci ltar dogs zhes bya ba'i skyon med do //
translated: Therefore, how can there be the fault that “direct perception is excluded by inference”?

original: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni /
analyzed: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni /
translated: The summary of the section is:

original: de'i phyir chos can zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos can zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the subject.

original: 'o na ci ltar chos can phyogs nyid yin pa sel zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar chos can phyogs nyid yin pa sel zhe na /
translated: Well then, how is the subject itself excluded?

original: de ni zhes smos te grub pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de ni zhes smos te grub pa'i chos can no //
translated: That is said by “that.” The subject that is established.

original: mtshan nyid gnyi gas kyang sel bar 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gnyi gas kyang sel bar 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If one thinks that it is excluded by both characteristics,

original: gtan tshigs kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said “by the reason.”

original: ldog ba ni lhag ma ste ha cang khyab pa zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽phyogs kyi mtshan nyid las gzhan gtan tshigs kyi @63a * //
analyzed: ldog ba ni lhag ma ste ha cang khyab pa zhes bya ba'i don to // phyogs kyi mtshan nyid las gzhan gtan tshigs kyi @63a * //
translated: The remainder is the exclusion, which means “too much pervasion.”

original: mtshan nyid kyis so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyis so //
translated: From the characteristic of the subject, by the characteristic of the reason.

original: de ni zhes bya ba spangs zin pa'i nyes pa ma spangs kyang ngo //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba spangs zin pa'i nyes pa ma spangs kyang ngo //
translated: That is, even though the fault already mentioned is not eliminated, nevertheless.

original: de tsam ni rang nyid smos pa dang bral ba tsam mo //
analyzed: de tsam ni rang nyid smos pa dang bral ba tsam mo //
translated: That much is just the mere absence of the mention of itself.

original: gzhan rang nyid smos pas ci bya /
analyzed: gzhan rang nyid smos pas ci bya /
translated: What is the use of mentioning another?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang ni don du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang ni don du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What is the purpose?

original: gal te rang nyid smos pas ha cang khyab pa mi spong na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te rang nyid smos pas ha cang khyab pa mi spong na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the mere mention of itself does not eliminate overextension, then.

original: 'o na ma khyab pa gang gis sel bar byed snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na ma khyab pa gang gis sel bar byed snyam na /
translated: Well, by what non-overextension is it eliminated?

original: 'dod sgras zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'dod sgras zhes smos so //
translated: It is said by the word 'desire'.

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba rnam par bcad zin pa rnam par gcod par byed bas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba rnam par bcad zin pa rnam par gcod par byed bas so //
translated: Another is what has already been excluded, by the exclusion.

original: rnam par ma bcad pa la brjod pa gang yin ba de dran par byed pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par ma bcad pa la brjod pa gang yin ba de dran par byed pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What is expressed in the unexcluded is reminded by if.

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa bsgrub par bya bar thal bar 'gyur ro zhes 'brel te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa bsgrub par bya bar thal bar 'gyur ro zhes 'brel te /
translated: It is connected as then the proof would be the probandum, showing that it is the proof itself.

original: de'i don du zhes bya ba ni skyon gzhan spang ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: de'i don du zhes bya ba ni skyon gzhan spang ba'i don du'o //
translated: The meaning of for that purpose is for the purpose of eliminating other faults.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'o //
translated: That is the exclusion.

original: ci'i phyir de khyab par 'dod pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de khyab par 'dod pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not accepted that it is pervasion?

original: ma bsal ba ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ma bsal ba ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says, “That which is not excluded.”

original: des na 'dod pa smos pa ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa kho na'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des na 'dod pa smos pa ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa kho na'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, he says, “Only that which has a result is accepted.”

original: khyab pa'i don du 'dod pa'i sgra byas pa yin no zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: khyab pa'i don du 'dod pa'i sgra byas pa yin no zhes 'brel to //
translated: The word “accepted” is used in the sense of pervasion.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni bsal ba yang ngo //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni bsal ba yang ngo //
translated: And that is also means “that which is excluded.”

original: gang gi tshe ma bsal ba'i tshig dang lhan cig byed pa de'i tshe ni /
analyzed: gang gi tshe ma bsal ba'i tshig dang lhan cig byed pa de'i tshe ni /
translated: When the word “not excluded” is used together with the word “excluded,”

original: bsal ba la yang khyab pa srid pa gal 'gyur te mi 'gyur pa kho na'o //
analyzed: bsal ba la yang khyab pa srid pa gal 'gyur te mi 'gyur pa kho na'o //
translated: then how could it be possible that pervasion would be possible in that which is excluded? It is not possible.

original: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The summary of the topic is “Therefore.”

original: 'o na ci ltar rigs pa'i sgor ldog pa la gnod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar rigs pa'i sgor ldog pa la gnod par 'gyur te /
translated: But how could it be possible to negate the door of reasoning?

original: rang nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig rnams med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rang nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig rnams med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the words “itself” and so on are not there.

original: de la zhes smos te rigs pa'i sgor ro //🔽bsgrub bya khas blangs zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la zhes smos te rigs pa'i sgor ro // bsgrub bya khas blangs zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In response to that, he says, “In the door of reasoning.”🔽The words “accepts the probandum” mean

original: bsgrub bya yin gyi /
analyzed: bsgrub bya yin gyi /
translated: that it is the probandum.

original: bsgrub bya ma yin pa ni ma yin te ;
analyzed: bsgrub bya ma yin pa ni ma yin te ;
translated: It is not that which is to be established,

original: / tshad ma dag gis bsal ba ni bsgrub par 'os pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / tshad ma dag gis bsal ba ni bsgrub par 'os pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because what is refuted by valid cognitions is not suitable to be established.

original: grub pa'i chos can yang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir dang / ma grub pa sgrub par byed pa nyid du brjod pa dang bstan bcos kyi 'dod pa yang khas len pa pos khas ma blangs pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: grub pa'i chos can yang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir dang / ma grub pa sgrub par byed pa nyid du brjod pa dang bstan bcos kyi 'dod pa yang khas len pa pos khas ma blangs pa'i phyir na /
translated: Also, the established subject does not exist by its own nature, because it does not follow, and because the proponent does not accept the statement that it is the proof of what is not established and the treatise’s assertion.

original: dngos po la rnam par gcad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po la rnam par gcad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is not the property of the subject.

original: der khas blangs pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i don can ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: der khas blangs pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i don can ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: The meaning of “that which is asserted as the thesis” is the definition of the position.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rnam par gcad pa dag phyogs nyid ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnam par gcad pa dag phyogs nyid ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the statement “the exclusions are not the position”

original: de rnams la ni zhes bya ba ste bsal ba la sogs pa rnams @63b la'o //
analyzed: de rnams la ni zhes bya ba ste bsal ba la sogs pa rnams @63b la'o //
translated: means “in those,” that is, in the exclusions and so on.

original: ci ltar zhe na bsal ba zhes gsungs te 'gal ba'i don gyis ma bsal ba zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na bsal ba zhes gsungs te 'gal ba'i don gyis ma bsal ba zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: How so? He says, “excluded,” because he says “not excluded” in the sense of contradictory.

original: lhag ma la ni mtshan nyid de bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: lhag ma la ni mtshan nyid de bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod ba zhes bya ba /
translated: The remainder is the definition of the probandum.

original: bsgrub byar khas blangs zhes de ltar rjes su brjod ba 'jug ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub byar khas blangs zhes de ltar rjes su brjod ba 'jug ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The expression “accepted as the probandum” is not used, because there is no need to use it.

original: des na mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba la ltos nas rigs pa'i sgor brjod pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyang nyes pa med pa kho na'o zhes dgongs pa'o //🔽'grel ba sun dbyung ba'i phyir rjes su brjod pa ni /
analyzed: des na mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba la ltos nas rigs pa'i sgor brjod pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyang nyes pa med pa kho na'o zhes dgongs pa'o // 'grel ba sun dbyung ba'i phyir rjes su brjod pa ni /
translated: Therefore, with an eye to those who delight in brevity, the definition of the thesis in the NM is also faultless.

original: 'dir de kho na'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir de kho na'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To refute the commentary, he says, “Here, it is just that . . .”

original: lha dbang blo'i bshad pa de ni de ltar ma yin te'o //
analyzed: lha dbang blo'i bshad pa de ni de ltar ma yin te'o //
translated: The explanation of Devendrabuddhi is not like that.

original: gzhan ni 'dir ci zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni 'dir ci zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The other is “What is it here?” and so on.

original: bsgrub pa sngar ci ltar bstan ces dogs na ma grub ces gsungs so //
analyzed: bsgrub pa sngar ci ltar bstan ces dogs na ma grub ces gsungs so //
translated: If it is asked, “How is the proof as previously taught?” he says, “It is not established.”

original: 'on te bstan zin pa nyid mjug sdud pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te bstan zin pa nyid mjug sdud pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is a conclusion of what has already been taught,

original: de nyid kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is “just that.”

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ste mtshan nyid kyi dag gang zhig go //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ste mtshan nyid kyi dag gang zhig go //
translated: “That which” is the statement of the definition.

original: 'di ni tshig la'o //
analyzed: 'di ni tshig la'o //
translated: This is a statement about the words.

original: de la ni mtshan nyid kyi ngag la'o //
analyzed: de la ni mtshan nyid kyi ngag la'o //
translated: “In that” is a statement about the words of the definition.

original: nyes pa 'dis 'jigs nas gzhan dag ni 'di'i don gzhan du smra'o //
analyzed: nyes pa 'dis 'jigs nas gzhan dag ni 'di'i don gzhan du smra'o //
translated: Fearing this fault, others explain the meaning of this passage differently.

original: de dag kyang mi rigs par smra ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du des brtags pa'i don brjod ba ni gzhan dag smra ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang mi rigs par smra ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du des brtags pa'i don brjod ba ni gzhan dag smra ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To show that their explanation is also unreasonable, the root text states, “Others say . . .”

original: 'di sun 'byin pa ni de yang ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di sun 'byin pa ni de yang ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The refutation of that is, “That is also not so . . .”

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it not so?

original: ma khyab pa dang ha cang khyab pa'i nyes pa ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma khyab pa dang ha cang khyab pa'i nyes pa ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not avoid the faults of overextension and underextension.

original: de la re zhig ha cang khyab pa'i nyis pa brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de la re zhig ha cang khyab pa'i nyis pa brjod pa ni /
translated: First, the fault of overextension is stated:

original: bsgrub par bya bar zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyis ni /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya bar zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyis ni /
translated: “The definition of the subject is that which is to be established.”

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa ma grub pa dang / bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur bar ma bzlog pa nyid do //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa ma grub pa dang / bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur bar ma bzlog pa nyid do //
translated: The desire to compose a treatise is not established as the probandum, and it is not refuted as the probandum.

original: bsgrub byar khas blangs zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pas bsgrub par bya bar thal ba'i spong ba'i dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: bsgrub byar khas blangs zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pas bsgrub par bya bar thal ba'i spong ba'i dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: Because the definition of the probandum is accepted.🔽The objection that the desire to compose a treatise is the probans is anticipated:

original: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “But if it is said that the desire to compose a treatise is the probans, then the probandum follows.”

original: de lta na yang ha cang thal ba ci ltar ldog stam  na /
analyzed: de lta na yang ha cang thal ba ci ltar ldog stam  na /
translated: Even so, how can the absurd conclusion be averted?

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The desire to compose a treatise is the probans.”

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'i sgrub byed do //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'i sgrub byed do //
translated: “That” refers to the unestablished probans.

original: rnam pa gzhan du nges par gzung ba'i dogs ba bsu ba ni /🔽'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du nges par gzung ba'i dogs ba bsu ba ni / 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The objection that the desire to compose a treatise is the probans is anticipated:🔽“But if it is said that the desire to compose a treatise is the probans, then the probandum follows.”

original: lan ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply is: “If that is so, then the desire to compose a treatise is the probans.”

original: des par gzung ba snga ma la ni ma khyab par 'gyur la /
analyzed: des par gzung ba snga ma la ni ma khyab par 'gyur la /
translated: In the former case, the probans is not pervaded by the probandum.

original: 'di la @64a * //
analyzed: 'di la @64a * //
translated: In this case,

original: ni ha cang khyab par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ni ha cang khyab par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is too broad.

original: 'on te de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa nyid du khas blangs ba'i phyir bsgrub bar bya ba nyid ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa nyid du khas blangs ba'i phyir bsgrub bar bya ba nyid ma yin no snyam na /
translated: But if you think that at that time it is not the thesis because it is accepted as the proof,

original: de ni zhes bya ba'o /
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba'o /
translated: then it is this.

original: gnyi ga ni sgrub par byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: gnyi ga ni sgrub par byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Both are the characteristics of the proof and the thesis.

original: de'i tshe ni sgrub par byed pa kho na sin gyi bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i tshe ni sgrub par byed pa kho na sin gyi bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: At that time, it is only the proof, not the thesis.

original: 'di zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is it.

original: phyogs 'di la sgrub par byed par 'dod ba bsgrub byar 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs 'di la sgrub par byed par 'dod ba bsgrub byar 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Not only is what is asserted as the proof in this position the thesis, but also the thesis of the treatise-maker becomes the thesis.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de la yang bya ba ste bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa la yang bstan bcos byed pa'i khas blangs pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang bya ba ste bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa la yang bstan bcos byed pa'i khas blangs pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is also the activity of the treatise-maker's thesis, since the treatise-maker's assertion exists.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba'o //
translated: But if you think... is introducing a doubt.

original: gang la rgol ba nyid kyis khas blangs pa yod kyi bstan bcos byed pa'i ma yin pa de la phyogs nyid du yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang la rgol ba nyid kyis khas blangs pa yod kyi bstan bcos byed pa'i ma yin pa de la phyogs nyid du yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the opponent himself accepts something, then that is a thesis, not a treatise.

original: phyogs 'di sun 'byin pa ni /
analyzed: phyogs 'di sun 'byin pa ni /
translated: The refutation of this position is as follows:

original: de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is not so.

original: rgol bas zhes bya ba ni rigs pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: rgol bas zhes bya ba ni rigs pa la sogs pas so //
translated: The opponent is the one who argues by means of reasoning, etc.

original: nye ba 'ba' zhig tu rigs pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang khyab ba yang yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: nye ba 'ba' zhig tu rigs pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang khyab ba yang yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: It is not just the mere assertion that is the reason, but also the pervasion.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is being said.

original: ci ste khas mi len te /
analyzed: ci ste khas mi len te /
translated: Moreover, if one does not accept the pervasion,

original: de nyid khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: then one must accept the pervasion.

original: des na bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du thel te /
analyzed: des na bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du thel te /
translated: Therefore, the assertion of the treatise writer is also the thesis,

original: bsgrub byar khas blangs zhes bya ba 'di la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: bsgrub byar khas blangs zhes bya ba 'di la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro /
translated: because there is no difference between the two in terms of being accepted as the thesis.

original: 'on te rgol ba'i 'dod pa la blos byas pa'i nye bar 'dod na /
analyzed: 'on te rgol ba'i 'dod pa la blos byas pa'i nye bar 'dod na /
translated: But if the opponent’s assertion is a mental fabrication,

original: de'i tshe bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa la yang de srid do zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa la yang de srid do zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: then the assertion of the treatise writer is also a mental fabrication.

original: blos byed pa bya ba'o //
analyzed: blos byed pa bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of “to be done” is to be accomplished.🔽Not only is it the case that what is to be established and what is to be accomplished are the thesis, but also that which is to be eliminated is the thesis.

original: sgrub byed du 'dod pa dang / bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa phyogs su 'gyur pa 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad kyi bsal ba bsgrub par bya bar khas blangs na yang phyogs nyid du 'gyur ro zhes ston ba ni bsal ba zhes bya ba'o //🔽gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir na /
analyzed: sgrub byed du 'dod pa dang / bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa phyogs su 'gyur pa 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad kyi bsal ba bsgrub par bya bar khas blangs na yang phyogs nyid du 'gyur ro zhes ston ba ni bsal ba zhes bya ba'o // gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir na /
translated: The meaning of “to be eliminated” is to be refuted.

original: gzhan gyi de nyid mjug bsdu ba yin no zhes brjod pa dang 'di ni rnam 'grel byed pa nyid kyi yin no zhes bya ba de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi de nyid mjug bsdu ba yin no zhes brjod pa dang 'di ni rnam 'grel byed pa nyid kyi yin no zhes bya ba de ni ma yin no //
translated: Since that is the case, it is not the case that the meaning of “to be accomplished” is to be concluded as the reality of the other, and that the meaning of “to be accomplished” is to be composed by the author of the treatise.

original: de ltar gzhan gyi 'dod pa bzlog nas rang gi 'dod pa brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar gzhan gyi 'dod pa bzlog nas rang gi 'dod pa brjod pa ni /
translated: Having thus refuted the assertions of others, he states his own assertion.

original: de lta ni'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta ni'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of “if that is so” is as follows.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bsgrub byar khas blangs zhes bya pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bsgrub byar khas blangs zhes bya pa'o //
translated: The meaning of “this” is that which is accepted as the thesis.

original: rigs @64b pa'i sgo'i mtshan nyid de yang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: rigs @64b pa'i sgo'i mtshan nyid de yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the definition of the door of reasoning?

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod par gyur ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod par gyur ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of “that which is to be established” is that which is accepted as the thesis.

original: gal te de ltan yang rnam 'grel 'di la 'jug pa ci ltar yin snyam na /
analyzed: gal te de ltan yang rnam 'grel 'di la 'jug pa ci ltar yin snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, “In that case, how does this Commentary enter into the subject matter of the Pramanavarttika?”

original: de lta zhes bya ba ste rigs pa'i sgor brjod pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid la /
analyzed: de lta zhes bya ba ste rigs pa'i sgor brjod pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid la /
translated: “ In that way” refers to the definition of a position that is expressed by way of a logical approach.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni rjod bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni rjod bzhin pa'o //
translated: “ In this way” refers to what is being expressed.

original: de nyid brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ That itself is expressed” is “if.”

original: bsal ba rnams ci ltar bkag snyam na /
analyzed: bsal ba rnams ci ltar bkag snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, “How are the refutations eliminated?”

original: der yang zhes smos te rigs pa'i sgor brjod pa'i mtshan nyid la'o //
analyzed: der yang zhes smos te rigs pa'i sgor brjod pa'i mtshan nyid la'o //
translated: “ There” refers to the definition of a position that is expressed by way of a logical approach.

original: lhag ma ni ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The rest are the proof of what is not established and so forth.

original: skyon ni ha cang khyab pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: skyon ni ha cang khyab pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The fault is the characteristic of overpervasion.

original: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa dang / grub pa dag la mtshan nyid mi 'jug pa'i phyir phyogs nyid med mod /
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa dang / grub pa dag la mtshan nyid mi 'jug pa'i phyir phyogs nyid med mod /
translated: Since the definition does not apply to the desire and the establishment of the author of the treatise, there is no position.

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa la go ci ltar te der tshig ma smos pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa la go ci ltar te der tshig ma smos pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: But how is it that the desire to prove is not a position? Because the word “there” is not used.

original: 'dod par gyur pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod par gyur pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ The one who has the desire” is “the one who has the desire to prove.”

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod par 'gyur ba ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa dag la mi 'jug bas na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod par 'gyur ba ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa dag la mi 'jug bas na /
translated: Since one does not engage in proofs that are not established as the object to be established,

original: mi 'jug pa nyid de nyid kyi phyir ma grub pa'i sgrub bar byed pa de bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'jug pa nyid de nyid kyi phyir ma grub pa'i sgrub bar byed pa de bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: one does not engage in them. For that very reason, the proof that is not established is refuted.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi te /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi te /
translated: If is the other's.

original: gal te brjod pa'i tshul du rigs pa'i sgor sgrub par byed pa ma grub pa phyogs yin par bsal ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te brjod pa'i tshul du rigs pa'i sgor sgrub par byed pa ma grub pa phyogs yin par bsal ba yin na /
translated: If it is established as the door of reasoning in the manner of expression,

original: de'i tshe tshad ma kun las btus pa 'dir yang ngo //
analyzed: de'i tshe tshad ma kun las btus pa 'dir yang ngo //
translated: then at that time, it is also in this Compendium of Valid Cognition.

original: lan 'debs pa ni /
analyzed: lan 'debs pa ni /
translated: The answer is:

original: de ni bden te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni bden te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is true.

original: byed pa'i mtha' dang zhes bya ba ni bstan bya ba zhes bya ba'i tshig dang ngo //
analyzed: byed pa'i mtha' dang zhes bya ba ni bstan bya ba zhes bya ba'i tshig dang ngo //
translated: The end of the action and the word to be indicated.

original: dus gzhan du 'dod pas yul du byas pa'i sgrub byed ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: dus gzhan du 'dod pas yul du byas pa'i sgrub byed ma grub pa'o //
translated: The proof that takes as its object what is desired at another time is not established.

original: de zhes bya ba ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed ba bzlog pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed ba bzlog pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: That is for the sake of refuting the proof that is not established.

original: / tshad ma kun las btus pa 'dir ni nishtha yan lag ces bya ba khyad par te gtso bo ma yin te /
analyzed: / tshad ma kun las btus pa 'dir ni nishtha yan lag ces bya ba khyad par te gtso bo ma yin te /
translated: In this Compendium of Valid Cognition, the term “special” is a subordinate part, not the main point.

original: byed pa'i rkyen gyi mtha' can gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: byed pa'i rkyen gyi mtha' can gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro zhes sbyar ro //
translated: It is connected by “because the final condition is the main point.”

original: des na der dus gzhan gyi dbang gis gtan tshigs ma grub pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod par 'gyur ba yang kho na'i sgra med na phyogs nyid du thal bar 'gyur bas de bzlog pa'i don du nges par gzud bas 'bras bu dang bcas pa kho
analyzed: des na der dus gzhan gyi dbang gis gtan tshigs ma grub pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod par 'gyur ba yang kho na'i sgra med na phyogs nyid du thal bar 'gyur bas de bzlog pa'i don du nges par gzud bas 'bras bu dang bcas pa kho
translated: Therefore, there, the reason that is not established by another time is asserted to be the probandum itself. If the word “only” is not used, it would follow that it is the position itself. Therefore, in order to refute that, it is definitely included to have a result.

original: na'o // 'dod par gyur pa'i tshig la ni /
analyzed: na'o // 'dod par gyur pa'i tshig la ni /
translated: In a statement that has become the desire,

original: 'dod rkyen yan lag ma yin pa ste gtso bo kho na yin no //
analyzed: 'dod rkyen yan lag ma yin pa ste gtso bo kho na yin no //
translated: it is not a condition of desire, a subordinate part, but only the main point.

original: de yis ni 'dod rkyen gyis so //🔽ci ltar bzlog pa dang @65a * //
analyzed: de yis ni 'dod rkyen gyis so // ci ltar bzlog pa dang @65a * //
translated: By that, it is by the condition of desire.

original: 'brel zhe na /
analyzed: 'brel zhe na /
translated: How is it related to the negation?

original: 'dod par gyur pa'i tshig la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod par gyur pa'i tshig la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In a statement that has become the desire.

original: byung ba'i dus sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ste rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: byung ba'i dus sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ste rgyu ma yin no //
translated: The subordinate part that establishes the time of occurrence is not the cause.

original: der zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'i sgor brjod pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid la'o //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'i sgor brjod pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid la'o //
translated: “There” refers to the definition of a position that is stated in the Entrance to Logic.

original: 'di thams cad ni rang nyid smos ba chos can bsgrub byar byed pa dgag pa la sogs pa'i rjod byed du khas blangs nas brjod par zad do //
analyzed: 'di thams cad ni rang nyid smos ba chos can bsgrub byar byed pa dgag pa la sogs pa'i rjod byed du khas blangs nas brjod par zad do //
translated: All of this is merely stated by the one who is himself the proponent, who accepts the subject and the probandum, and so on, as the means of expression.

original: da ni med pa'i phyir de don nyid ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni rjod byed min phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: da ni med pa'i phyir de don nyid ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni rjod byed min phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Now, to say that “it is not a real object because it does not exist” is “because it is not the means of expression.”

original: de 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni rgol ba 'dod ba'o //
analyzed: de 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni rgol ba 'dod ba'o //
translated: “That is accepted” means that the opponent accepts it.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'i 'dod pa tsam bsgrub bar bya ba yin pas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'i 'dod pa tsam bsgrub bar bya ba yin pas na'o //
translated: “Therefore” means that the mere wish of the opponent is what is to be established.🔽“The non-wish” is the quality of space, and the wish is the connection to the same object.

original: mi 'dod pa nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dad don gcig la 'du bas 'brel ba'i 'dod pa mi rtag pa nyid la gnod pa na yang ste /
analyzed: mi 'dod pa nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dad don gcig la 'du bas 'brel ba'i 'dod pa mi rtag pa nyid la gnod pa na yang ste /
translated: “When there is a contradiction” means when there is a contradiction with the wish for impermanence.

original: mi rtag ba 'ba' zhig grub kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi rtag ba 'ba' zhig grub kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that “even if only the impermanent is established.”

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ci ltar bsgrub la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar bsgrub la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “How is it established?”

original: de lta ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'i 'dod pa ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'i 'dod pa ma yin pa la'o //
translated: “Otherwise” means not according to the opponent’s assertion.

original: des zhes bya ba mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub pa des so //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub pa des so //
translated: “By that” means by the proof of impermanence.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na nus pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na nus pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Why? “Because it is possible.”

original: des na bstan bcos kyi 'dod pa dor la bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar bsams ba'o //
analyzed: des na bstan bcos kyi 'dod pa dor la bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar bsams ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the author of the treatise would abandon his own assertion and would not prove the probandum.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni gal te bstan bcos byed ba'i 'dod pa yang bsgrub par bya ba yin na de'i tshe bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa dang / rang nyid 'dod pa mtha' dag kyang nyams par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni gal te bstan bcos byed ba'i 'dod pa yang bsgrub par bya ba yin na de'i tshe bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa dang / rang nyid 'dod pa mtha' dag kyang nyams par 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, if the assertion of the author of the treatise is the probandum, then at that time the assertion of the author of the treatise and all of his own assertions would be undermined,

original: de sgrub par byed ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de sgrub par byed ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible to prove that.

original: des na thams cad brlag pa bas ni /
analyzed: des na thams cad brlag pa bas ni /
translated: Therefore, it is better to lose everything

original: rang gi 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya cung zad thob pa na'o //
analyzed: rang gi 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya cung zad thob pa na'o //
translated: than to obtain a little of what one wants to prove.

original: de la ni sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la ni sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In that case, it is possible to have a proof that proves it.

original: 'on te bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa ma grub na rang nyid 'dod pa grub pas ci phan snyam na /🔽bu ma ba zhes bya ba'o //🔽bshad pa'i don skabs su bab pa'i mjug sdud pa ni /
analyzed: 'on te bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa ma grub na rang nyid 'dod pa grub pas ci phan snyam na / bu ma ba zhes bya ba'o // bshad pa'i don skabs su bab pa'i mjug sdud pa ni /
translated: But if the desire to compose a treatise is not established, what is the use of establishing one's own desire?🔽The answer is because of the desire to compose a treatise.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //🔽de la te de ltar gnas ba la'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o // de la te de ltar gnas ba la'o //
translated: The summary of the topic under discussion is therefore.

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khas blangs pa de la'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khas blangs pa de la'o //
translated: In that case, that is, in that way, in that case means in the acceptance of what is to be established.

original: tshad ma dag gis bkag pa med pa yin par 'dod do //
analyzed: tshad ma dag gis bkag pa med pa yin par 'dod do //
translated: It is accepted that there is no contradiction by valid cognitions.

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni tshad ma dag gis ma bkag pa khas blang bar bya ba la rigs ba ci yod ces dris ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni tshad ma dag gis ma bkag pa khas blang bar bya ba la rigs ba ci yod ces dris ba'o //
translated: Here, in this case asks, What is the reason for accepting what is not contradicted by valid cognitions?

original: lan ni gtan tshigs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni gtan tshigs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is because of the reason.

original: gzhan du yang ci ste ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan du yang ci ste ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why not in another way?

original: tshad ma gcig gis zhes @65b bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshad ma gcig gis zhes @65b bya ba'o //
translated: It is said by one valid cognition.

original: phyin ci log tu yod ba'am med par sgrub pa la'o //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu yod ba'am med par sgrub pa la'o //
translated: It is in the establishment of existence or non-existence in a mistaken way.

original: de med na ste bzlog ba med na ni'o //
analyzed: de med na ste bzlog ba med na ni'o //
translated: If that does not exist, that is, if it is not averted, then.

original: de tsam ste phyogs tsam las gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de tsam ste phyogs tsam las gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because it is merely a partial position.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
translated: This is clarified by

original: mngon sum dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “direct perception,” etc.

original: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni bsal kyang sgrub par byed pa la ltos na'o //
analyzed: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni bsal kyang sgrub par byed pa la ltos na'o //
translated: “If that were the case” means that even if there were a refutation, it would depend on the proof.

original: de'i tshe thams cad la yid mi ches pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe thams cad la yid mi ches pa kho na ste /
translated: At that time, there would be no confidence in anything at all,

original: tshad mas gnod pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad mas gnod pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is possible that valid cognition could be undermined.

original: des na zhes bsgrub ba'i tshad med la yang yid ches pa ci yod /
analyzed: des na zhes bsgrub ba'i tshad med la yang yid ches pa ci yod /
translated: So what confidence can there be in the valid cognition that proves that?

original: gang gi phyir de ltar bsal ba gtan tshigs kyi yul dang 'thad pa ma yin pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar bsal ba gtan tshigs kyi yul dang 'thad pa ma yin pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because in that case, the refutation is not the domain of the reason, it is not tenable.

original: 'o na ci ltar du ba las glo pur du mi rtogs snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar du ba las glo pur du mi rtogs snyam na /
translated: Well then, how is it that one does not understand smoke to be a mountain?

original: tha tshom gyis ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: tha tshom gyis ni zhes smos so //
translated: “Doubt” is mentioned.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Here”

original: bsal ba gtan tshigs rten ma yin zhes bya ba'i tshig la'o //
analyzed: bsal ba gtan tshigs rten ma yin zhes bya ba'i tshig la'o //
translated: refers to the phrase “the refutation is not the domain of the reason.”

original: 'on skad cig ma nyid gtan tshigs kyi yul ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on skad cig ma nyid gtan tshigs kyi yul ma yin te /
translated: Well then, momentariness is not the domain of the reason,

original: de nyid 'di yin no snyam pa'i nges pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid 'di yin no snyam pa'i nges pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because there is a certainty that thinks “that itself is this.”

original: yang na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Or” is mentioned.

original: skad cig ma la ni the tshom skyed par nus pa yin te /
analyzed: skad cig ma la ni the tshom skyed par nus pa yin te /
translated: It is capable of generating doubt with regard to the momentary.

original: des na gtan tshigs kyi yul nyid do zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs kyi yul nyid do zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the domain of reasoning.

original: sgrub par byed pa dang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma dag gis nges pa la ni gtan tshigs kyi yul nyid yin par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa dang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma dag gis nges pa la ni gtan tshigs kyi yul nyid yin par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'brel to //
translated: When there is certainty through valid cognitions that establish and invalidate, it is not the domain of reasoning.

original: ci ltar nges ba la zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar nges ba la zhe na /
translated: How is there certainty?

original: rang gi ngo bo dang de las bzlog pa dag tu'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo dang de las bzlog pa dag tu'o //
translated: With regard to its own nature and the opposite of that.

original: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos so //
analyzed: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos so //
translated: By Master Dignaga.

original: de ltar ma yin na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it were not so,

original: gal te lung dang grags pas gnod pa rtags las yin par mi 'dod na de'i tshe rjes su dpag pa'i dbye ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te lung dang grags pas gnod pa rtags las yin par mi 'dod na de'i tshe rjes su dpag pa'i dbye ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: if one did not accept that scripture and renown invalidate from reasoning, then inference would not be divided.

original: gal te rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gsum ci ltar snyam na /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gsum ci ltar snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, how is there a threefold division of inference?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is like this.

original: bsal ba'i dbye bas ni rnam pa gsum ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bsal ba'i dbye bas ni rnam pa gsum ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not divided into three by the division of the object.

original: 'on kyang rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang de dag brnyan ma'i dbye bas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'on kyang rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang de dag brnyan ma'i dbye bas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: But it is not so, because of the distinction of nature, effect, and reflection.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni gnod pa rnam pa bzhi po de'i nang nas so //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni gnod pa rnam pa bzhi po de'i nang nas so //
translated: Among the four kinds of refutation, among them refers to the first two.

original: khas blangs ni yid ches pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: khas blangs ni yid ches pa'i tshig go //
translated: Acceptance is a statement of confidence.

original: rim pa btang nas 'di gnyis dang po 'chad pa ni gzhan gyis shes par 'dod pa'i dor ram brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim pa btang nas 'di gnyis dang po 'chad pa ni gzhan gyis shes par 'dod pa'i dor ram brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The order of the two is reversed in the explanation, because it is not the object of desire to be known by others, or to be expressed.

original: ci'i phyir dngos ma yin zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ci'i phyir dngos ma yin zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Why is it not real?

original: rtags 'di ni dngos kho na yin te /
analyzed: rtags 'di ni dngos kho na yin te /
translated: This mark is real.

original: de lta ma yin na /🔽gzugs brnyan yang gnod byed yin na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni phyogs @66a * //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na / gzugs brnyan yang gnod byed yin na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni phyogs @66a * //
translated: If it were not so,

original: snga ma pa'i bsam pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma pa'i bsam pa'o //
translated: if a reflection were also a refutation, there would be an infinite regress. This is the idea of the opponent.

original: bdag gzhan zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bdag gzhan zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The other is called self.

original: 'di gnod par byed par ni brjod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di gnod par byed par ni brjod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: This is not said to be a refutation,

original: 'on kyang gnod par byed pa nyid du khas len pa'i yul nges pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gnod par byed pa nyid du khas len pa'i yul nges pa yin no //
translated: but rather the object of accepting a refutation is determined.

original: 'dod ces bya ba ni yid ches par khas blangs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod ces bya ba ni yid ches par khas blangs pa'o //
translated: The word desire means to accept with confidence.

original: ci ltar zhe na yang dag nges ldan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na yang dag nges ldan zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How? Possessing the true and certain words.

original: gang gi phyir 'di yang dag pa'i don nges pa'i ngag dang ldan pa'i brjod pa can yin pa des na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di yang dag pa'i don nges pa'i ngag dang ldan pa'i brjod pa can yin pa des na /
translated: Since this is the expression of one who possesses the true and certain words,

original: rang gi tshig dang bstan bcos tshad ma yin par gcig tu zhes bya ba yid ches pa zhes de ltar slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi tshig dang bstan bcos tshad ma yin par gcig tu zhes bya ba yid ches pa zhes de ltar slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos bshad pa yin no //
translated: it is said that the master Dignaga explained that one should have confidence in his own words and treatises.

original: gnyi ga yang khas blangs pa'i tshad mar mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang khas blangs pa'i tshad mar mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because both are equally accepted as valid cognitions.

original: 'o na rjes su dpag pa las nges par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rjes su dpag pa las nges par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Well then, one will ascertain it through inference.

original: tha snyad 'chol bas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha snyad 'chol bas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of the confusion of conventions.

original: lhan cig tu zhes bya ba ni yid ches ba zhes de ltar ro //
analyzed: lhan cig tu zhes bya ba ni yid ches ba zhes de ltar ro //
translated: Together means with confidence.

original: rang gi tshig dang bstan bcos dag tshad mar khas mi len na ni de brjod pa dang / de la ston pa'i dpyod pa dag med par 'gyur zhes mtshungs pa nyid ston pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi tshig dang bstan bcos dag tshad mar khas mi len na ni de brjod pa dang / de la ston pa'i dpyod pa dag med par 'gyur zhes mtshungs pa nyid ston pa ni /
translated: If one does not accept one’s own words and treatises as valid cognitions, then one’s statements and the analysis of the Teacher would not exist.

original: ci ltar bdag ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar bdag ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The verse “Just as . . .” teaches the similarity.

original: der bsten min na ste bstan bcos khas ma blangs par ro //
analyzed: der bsten min na ste bstan bcos khas ma blangs par ro //
translated: “ There” means “if one does not accept the treatises.”

original: des ci zhig brjod snyam na /
analyzed: des ci zhig brjod snyam na /
translated: What is the point of that?

original: ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The verse “Just as . . .”

original: smra ba kun ni brdzun yin no zhes bya ba de ni 'gog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: smra ba kun ni brdzun yin no zhes bya ba de ni 'gog pa ma yin no //
translated: The statement “All speech is false” is not a refutation.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: gal te smra ba kun brdzun yin no zhes bya ba de yang 'gog na ni'o //
analyzed: gal te smra ba kun brdzun yin no zhes bya ba de yang 'gog na ni'o //
translated: If “All speech is false” were a refutation, then it would be false.

original: ci ltar 'di bsal snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'di bsal snyam na /
translated: How is this refuted?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The verse “Just as . . .”

original: 'di ga las snyam na tshig ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'di ga las snyam na tshig ni zhes smos so //
translated: Where is this from? The verse “The words . . .”

original: gal te dus gsum na yod pa thams cad tshad ma ma yin na de'i tshe de dag brjod pas ci bya /
analyzed: gal te dus gsum na yod pa thams cad tshad ma ma yin na de'i tshe de dag brjod pas ci bya /
translated: If all that exists in the three times is not a valid cognition, then what is the point of stating it?

original: brjod nas tshad ma ma yin par brjod na /
analyzed: brjod nas tshad ma ma yin par brjod na /
translated: If one states it, and then states that it is not a valid cognition,🔽.

original: bkrus nas zhes smos so //
analyzed: bkrus nas zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore, it says, having washed it.

original: rgyag pa'i nang du lhung ba'i la du len pa la /
analyzed: rgyag pa'i nang du lhung ba'i la du len pa la /
translated: In the case of taking a lentil that has fallen into a dish of beans,

original: khyod ci byed ces 'ga' zhig gis dris pa na /
analyzed: khyod ci byed ces 'ga' zhig gis dris pa na /
translated: if someone asks, What are you doing?

original: des de la bkrus nas dor bar bya'o zhes zer ba de dang 'dra bar dus gsum na yod pa'i brjod pa yang tshad mar brjod nas phyis tshig de tshad ma ma yin par byas nas dor par bya'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des de la bkrus nas dor bar bya'o zhes zer ba de dang 'dra bar dus gsum na yod pa'i brjod pa yang tshad mar brjod nas phyis tshig de tshad ma ma yin par byas nas dor par bya'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one might say, Having washed it, I will throw it away. In the same way, having asserted the validity of the statements of the three times, one might later reject them by saying, Those words are not valid.

original: dogs pa bsu ba ni phyis 'gyod pa'i phyir te tshad ma ma yin par bsgrub po zhe na /
analyzed: dogs pa bsu ba ni phyis 'gyod pa'i phyir te tshad ma ma yin par bsgrub po zhe na /
translated: One might object, But later one might regret it and so prove that it is not valid.

original: lan ni de lta na yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni de lta na yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is, Even so...

original: ci ltar 'gal zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'gal zhe na /
translated: How is it contradictory?

original: ma smras pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma smras pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: It says, ...because it is not stated.

original: byas pa ni tshig go //
analyzed: byas pa ni tshig go //
translated: The word done means stated.

original: 'di nyid ni ma dpyad pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni ma dpyad pa nyid do //
translated: This is simply not analyzing.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: @66b brtags pa legs pas zhes smos so //
analyzed: @66b brtags pa legs pas zhes smos so //
translated: It says, ...because it is well investigated.

original: 'dis ni 'das pa'i tshig tshad ma ma yin pa 'gog pa spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'das pa'i tshig tshad ma ma yin pa 'gog pa spangs pa yin no //
translated: This avoids the rejection of the refutation of the past words being invalid.

original: brjod pa 'dis ci bya zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: brjod pa 'dis ci bya zhes bya ba ni /
translated: What is the use of this statement?

original: 'di ni bdag gis brdzun byas pa yin no zhes smras pa 'dis ci bya ste 'di ni brjod par mi bya ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di ni bdag gis brdzun byas pa yin no zhes smras pa 'dis ci bya ste 'di ni brjod par mi bya ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: What is the use of this statement, “I am telling a lie”? It is only proper not to make this statement.

original: dang po nyid brjod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dang po nyid brjod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not to be stated from the very beginning.

original: 'o na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshig tshad ma yin pa 'gog go snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshig tshad ma yin pa 'gog go snyam na /
translated: If you think that the statement about the future is refuted,

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the meaning is that the future does not exist.

original: 'on te de'i tshe nyid rang gis smras nas 'gog go zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te de'i tshe nyid rang gis smras nas 'gog go zhe na /
translated: But if you think that the statement is refuted by the very person who makes it at that time,

original: de'i tshe ni da ltar pa nyid 'gog par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i tshe ni da ltar pa nyid 'gog par 'gyur la /
translated: then the present itself would be refuted.

original: de la yang nyes pa smras zin to //
analyzed: de la yang nyes pa smras zin to //
translated: And the error in that has already been stated.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i tshig la ni nyan pa po nyid med de des na 'di ni brdzun smras pa yin no zhes ci'i don du brjod /
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i tshig la ni nyan pa po nyid med de des na 'di ni brdzun smras pa yin no zhes ci'i don du brjod /
translated: But the listener does not exist at the time of the statement about the future. Therefore, what is the point of saying, “This is a lie”?

original: dzab mkhan ni gar byed pa'o //
analyzed: dzab mkhan ni gar byed pa'o //
translated: A conjurer is a dancer.

original: de'i dzab tshig ni glu'i khyad par te /
analyzed: de'i dzab tshig ni glu'i khyad par te /
translated: His conjuring words are a kind of song.

original: de la nyan pa med kyang bzhad gad gdon pa'i phyir 'jug pa ci lta ba de bzhin du kho bo ni brdzun smra ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang 'jug pas nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: de la nyan pa med kyang bzhad gad gdon pa'i phyir 'jug pa ci lta ba de bzhin du kho bo ni brdzun smra ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang 'jug pas nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: Just as one may say, “I am a liar,” and so on, in order to make others laugh, even though one is not a liar, and so on, in reality, so too, one may say, “I am a liar,” and so on, in order to make others laugh, even though one is not a liar, and so on, in reality.

original: ma yin te rtsod pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro zhes smos so //
analyzed: ma yin te rtsod pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro zhes smos so //
translated: No, because it is a matter of dispute.

original: rtsod pa ni phyir rgol ba med par mi smra ba des na ci ltar 'di dper rigs zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rtsod pa ni phyir rgol ba med par mi smra ba des na ci ltar 'di dper rigs zhes bya ba'i don to // ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: A dispute is not settled without an opponent. Therefore, how can this be a proper example?🔽Why?

original: rtsod pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtsod pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is a matter of dispute.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni tshig tshad ma ma yin par ston pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni tshig tshad ma ma yin par ston pa'o //
translated: That is, the statement is not a valid one.

original: 'dir don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The point here is this.

original: gang zhig rtog pa dang ldan pas gzhan rtogs pa'i don tu brjod pa de ni bden pa'i don can du khas blangs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig rtog pa dang ldan pas gzhan rtogs pa'i don tu brjod pa de ni bden pa'i don can du khas blangs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin te /
translated: One who, with understanding, makes a statement in order to make others understand, does so only if he accepts that the meaning of his statement is true.

original: dper na bdag gis smras pa thams cad brdzun yin no zhes brjod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bdag gis smras pa thams cad brdzun yin no zhes brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: This is just like the statement, “Everything I say is false.”

original: gzhal bya'i don can gyi tshad ma dag med do zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang rtog pa dang ldan pas brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhal bya'i don can gyi tshad ma dag med do zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang rtog pa dang ldan pas brjod pa yin no //
translated: The words “there is no valid cognition that has an object” are also spoken by someone who has a conception.

original: des na tshad ma ma yin par dam bca' ba ni rang gi tshig gis bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: des na tshad ma ma yin par dam bca' ba ni rang gi tshig gis bsal ba yin no //
translated: Thus, the thesis that there is no valid cognition is undermined by one’s own words.

original: ci ltar bdag nyid tshad ma ma yin na tshig mi 'jug pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ci ltar bdag nyid tshad ma ma yin na tshig mi 'jug pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as one who is not a valid person does not engage in speech,

original: bstan bcos de khas ma blangs na /
analyzed: bstan bcos de khas ma blangs na /
translated: in the same way, if one does not accept the treatise,

original: bstan bcos las grags pa'i don la yang dpyod pa mi 'jug pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos las grags pa'i don la yang dpyod pa mi 'jug pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
translated: it follows that one does not engage in analysis of the meaning that is known from the treatise.

original: gal te mtshungs par bstan pa'i don du lhan cig brjod par yin yang lhag pa brjod pa ci yod snyam na /
analyzed: gal te mtshungs par bstan pa'i don du lhan cig brjod par yin yang lhag pa brjod pa ci yod snyam na /
translated: If one thinks that although it is stated for the sake of equality, what is the point of stating the additional words?

original: mtshungs par zhes gsungs so //🔽mtshungs par bstan pa'i phyir na te bstan pa'i don du bstan bcos 'di rang @67a * //
analyzed: mtshungs par zhes gsungs so // mtshungs par bstan pa'i phyir na te bstan pa'i don du bstan bcos 'di rang @67a * //
translated: The word “also” is stated for the sake of equality.🔽Because it is stated for the sake of equality, this treatise is stated together with its own words.

original: gi tshig dang lhan cig brjod pa gang yin pa de ni bstan bcos ni gang gi tshe kho na /
analyzed: gi tshig dang lhan cig brjod pa gang yin pa de ni bstan bcos ni gang gi tshe kho na /
translated: That which is stated for the sake of equality is the treatise.

original: rnam par dpyod pa'i skabs kyi chos can rnam par 'jog pa'i sgo nas /
analyzed: rnam par dpyod pa'i skabs kyi chos can rnam par 'jog pa'i sgo nas /
translated: The treatise is the basis for positing the subject when there is analysis.

original: bstan bcos rten nyid yin ba de'i tshe nyid na /
analyzed: bstan bcos rten nyid yin ba de'i tshe nyid na /
translated: At that time,

original: de las bzlog pa'i chos khas len pa la gnod par byed pa yin gyi gzhan gyi tshe ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan pa'i ched du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa'i chos khas len pa la gnod par byed pa yin gyi gzhan gyi tshe ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan pa'i ched du byas pa yin no //
translated: it is the refutation of the assertion of a contrary phenomenon, and not at any other time. This is the meaning of the passage.

original: de lta ma yin na bstan bcos rang gi tshig pas nus ba lhag pa can du rtogs par 'gyur du 'ong bas so //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na bstan bcos rang gi tshig pas nus ba lhag pa can du rtogs par 'gyur du 'ong bas so //
translated: Otherwise, it would be as if the treatise itself were powerless.

original: de lta yin dang gzhan gyi lugs ltar rnam par dpyod pa'i skabs kyi rten yin na yang gnod par byed par yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin dang gzhan gyi lugs ltar rnam par dpyod pa'i skabs kyi rten yin na yang gnod par byed par yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then even if it were the basis for analysis of the opponent's system, it would be powerless.

original: sngar ni mtshungs par bstan pa nyid /
analyzed: sngar ni mtshungs par bstan pa nyid /
translated: This is just as was previously explained.

original: lhan cig bshad pa'i dogs pa yin par brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: lhan cig bshad pa'i dogs pa yin par brjod pa yin la /
translated: The doubt that is expressed is a doubt about the joint assertion.

original: da lta ni mtshungs par bstan pa'i dgos pa yang de'i skabs kyi rten nyid yin na bstan bcos gnod par byed pa yin gyi gzhan gyi tshe ma yin no //
analyzed: da lta ni mtshungs par bstan pa'i dgos pa yang de'i skabs kyi rten nyid yin na bstan bcos gnod par byed pa yin gyi gzhan gyi tshe ma yin no //
translated: The purpose of the teaching of the present is that it is the basis for the purpose of that occasion, but the treatise is a refutation, not at another time.

original: lhan cig bshad pa'i dgos pa'i dgos pa brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig bshad pa'i dgos pa'i dgos pa brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par yin no //
translated: The purpose of the purpose of the joint explanation has been stated. This is the difference.

original: 'di nyid bshad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid bshad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is explained: if...

original: de lta ma yin na ci skyon snyam na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ci skyon snyam na /
translated: If it were not so, what would be the fault?

original: lhan cig bshad pa ma yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lhan cig bshad pa ma yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it were not a joint explanation...

original: pha rol po ni rigs pa can la sogs pa dag go //
analyzed: pha rol po ni rigs pa can la sogs pa dag go //
translated: The opponent is the Naiyāyika and so on.🔽Just so...

original: de lta bu nyid du zhes bya ba nus ba lhag pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid du zhes bya ba nus ba lhag pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: The excess of ability would be just so.

original: dgos pa 'di bzlog pa'i don du rang gi tshig dang bstan bcos dag yid ches pa'i tshig gis brjod par bya bar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: dgos pa 'di bzlog pa'i don du rang gi tshig dang bstan bcos dag yid ches pa'i tshig gis brjod par bya bar bstan pa yin no //
translated: For the purpose of refuting this purpose, it is taught that one's own words and treatises should be stated with trustworthy words.

original: khas blangs nas de dang 'gal ba la de gnod par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: khas blangs nas de dang 'gal ba la de gnod par byed pa yin te /
translated: Having accepted, that which contradicts it is refuted by that.

original: dper na gzhal bya'i don can gyi tshad ma dag med do zhes rang gi tshig dang bstan bcos dag gi dper brjod pa mtshungs pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni des na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dper na gzhal bya'i don can gyi tshad ma dag med do zhes rang gi tshig dang bstan bcos dag gi dper brjod pa mtshungs pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni des na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: For example, it is like the statement, “The valid cognitions that are the objects of comprehension do not exist,” which is similar to the example in your own words and treatises.

original: grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa nyid kyis na'o //
analyzed: grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa nyid kyis na'o //
translated: Because of the sameness of establishment and happiness.

original: 'di nyid ga las zhe na /
analyzed: 'di nyid ga las zhe na /
translated: From where is this?

original: tshad ma rnams ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshad ma rnams ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The valid cognitions.

original: grub pa dang bde ba gcig ba de nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: grub pa dang bde ba gcig ba de nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the sameness of establishment and happiness.

original: gal te tshad ma 'gog na rang gi tshig mi 'thad mod /
analyzed: gal te tshad ma 'gog na rang gi tshig mi 'thad mod /
translated: If you refute valid cognitions, your own words are untenable.

original: bstan bcos go ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: bstan bcos go ci ltar zhe na /
translated: But what about the treatise?

original: tshad ma 'gog na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshad ma 'gog na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you refute valid cognitions.

original: rang gi tshig 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad de bstan bcos kyang ngo //
analyzed: rang gi tshig 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad de bstan bcos kyang ngo //
translated: It is not only your own words but also the treatise.

original: de'i phyir bstan bcos ci zhig ste ci'i phyir khas len mi blang ba kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bstan bcos ci zhig ste ci'i phyir khas len mi blang ba kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, what is the point of the treatise? Why not simply not accept anything?

original: des na phan tshun 'gal ba tsam kho nar 'gyur gyi khas len pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na phan tshun 'gal ba tsam kho nar 'gyur gyi khas len pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it would be only a contradiction, but it would not be an acceptance.
